☰ Document Outline

The Sarvavajrodayā Maṇḍalopāyikā

Digital Critical Edition and Translation of the Preserved Sanskrit Text

edited by Arlo Griffiths, Ryugen Tanemura & Shiori Ijuin

Current Version: draft, 2024-05-10Z
Still in progress – do not quote without permission.
  • Witnesses
  • Metadata

List of Witnesses

  • : National Archives, Kathmandu, palemleaf, ???
    • Content:
      • Sarvavajrodayā Maṇḍalopāyikā by Ānandagarbha
    • Colophon:
      • : .....
    • Physical Description: Palm-leaf manuscript. ... leaves in Bhujimol script. Apparently written in the 14th century CE.
    • Hand Description: A1H1main hand of the manuscript, black ink, ... script
    • History: ...

Metadata of the Edition

  • Title: The Sarvavajrodayā Maṇḍalopāyikā. Digital Critical Edition and Translation of the Preserved Sanskrit Text
  • Text Identifier: DHARMA_CritEdSarvatathagatatattvasangraha
  • Edited by Arlo Griffiths, Ryugen Tanemura & Shiori Ijuin
  • Copyright © 2019-2025 by Arlo Griffiths, Ryugen Tanemura and Shiori Ijuin.

This project has received funding from the European Research Council (ERC) under the European Union’s Horizon 2020 research and innovation programme (grant agreement no 809994).

0

STT:1_1_0

sarvatathāgatamahāyānābhisamayo nāma mahākalparājaḥ

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition DHARMA_CritEdSarvatathagatatattvasangraha


0

STT:1_1_0

vajradhātumahāmaṇḍalavidhivistaraḥ

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition DHARMA_CritEdSarvatathagatatattvasangraha


1

STT:1_1_1

evaṃ mayā śrutam

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition DHARMA_CritEdSarvatathagatatattvasangraha


2

STT:1_1_2

ekasmin samaye bhagavān sarvataghāgatavajrādhiṣṭhānasamayajñānavividhaviśeṣasamanvāgataḥ / sarvatathāgataratnamukuṭatraidhātukadharmarājyābhiṣekaprāptaḥ / sarvatathāgatasarvajñajñānamahāyogīśvaraḥ / sarvatathāgatasarvamudrāsamatādhigataviśvakāryakaraṇatāśeṣānavaśeṣasattvadhātusarvāśāparipūrakaḥ /

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition DHARMA_CritEdSarvatathagatatattvasangraha


3

STT:1_2_3

mahākṛpo vairocanaḥ śāśvatas tryadhvasamayavyavasthitaḥ sarvakāryavākcittavajras tathāgataḥ sarvatathāgatādhyuṣitapraśastastavite mahāmaṇiratnapratyupte vicitravarṇaghaṇṭāvasaktamārutoddhūtapaṭṭasrakcāmarahārārdhahārārdhacandropaśobhite ’kaniṣṭhadevarājasya bhavane vijahāra /

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition DHARMA_CritEdSarvatathagatatattvasangraha


5

STT:1_2_5

navanavatibhir bodhisattvakoṭibhiḥ sārdhaṃ / tad yathā vajrapāṇinā ca bodhisattvena / avalokiteśvareṇa ca bodhisattvena / ākāśagarbheṇa ca / vajramuṣṭinā ca / mañjuśriyā ca / sahacittotpādadharmacakrapravartinā ca / gaganagañjena ca / sarvamārabalapramardinā ca / evaṃpramukhair navanavatibhir bodhisattvakoṭibhiḥ /

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition DHARMA_CritEdSarvatathagatatattvasangraha


6

STT:1_2_6

gaṅgānadīvālukāsamākhyātaiś ca tathāgatais, tad yathāpi nāma tilabimbam iva, paripūrṇaṃ jambūdvīpesaṃdṛśyate / taiś cāprameyais tathāgatakāyair ekaikasmāc ca tathāgatakāyād aprameyāsaṃkhyenāni buddhakṣetrāṇi saṃdṛśyante teṣu ca buddhakṣetreṣv imam eva dharmanayaṃ deśayanti sma //

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition DHARMA_CritEdSarvatathagatatattvasangraha


7

STT:1_9_7

atha bhagavān mahāvairocanaḥ sarvākāśadhātusadāvasthitakāyavākcittavajraḥ /

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition DHARMA_CritEdSarvatathagatatattvasangraha


8

STT:1_9_8

sarvatathāgatasamavasaraṇatayā sarvavajradhātvavabodhanajñānasattvaḥ / sarvākāśadhātuparamāṇurajovajrādhiṣṭhānasaṃbhavajñānagarbhaḥ / sarvatathāgatānantatayā mahāvajrajñānābhiṣekaratnaḥ / sarvākāśaspharaṇatathatājñānābhisaṃbodhyabhisaṃbodhibhūtaḥ sarvatathāgatātmabhāvaśuddhitayā svabhāvaśuddhasarvadharmaḥ / sarvākāśavyāpisarvarūpasaṃdarśanajñānāśeṣā=navaśeṣasattvadhātuvinayanacaryāgryaḥ sarvatathāgatāmoghājñākāritayā sarvāsamānuttaraviśvakarmā //

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition DHARMA_CritEdSarvatathagatatattvasangraha


9

STT:1_10_9

sarvatathāgatamahābodhidṛḍhasattvaḥ sarvatathāgatākarṣaṇasamayaḥ sarvatathāgatānurāgaṇajñāneśvaraḥ sarvatathāgatasādhukāraḥ sarvatathāgatamahābhiṣekaratnaḥ sarvatathāgatasūryaprabhāmaṇḍalaḥ sarvatathāgatacintārājamaṇiratnaketuḥ sarvatathāgatamahāhāsaḥ

Translation

10

STT:1_14_13

14

15

18

STT:1_23_18

atha khalu sarvatathāgatāḥ mahāsamājam āpadya yena sarvārthasiddhir bodhisattvo mahāsattvo bodhimaṇḍaniṣaṇṇas, tenopajagmuḥ /. upetya bodhisattvasya sāṃbhogikaiḥ kāyair darśanaṃ dattvaivam āhuḥ/ " kathaṃ kulaputrānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbhotsyase, yas tvaṃ sarvatathāgatatattvānabhijñatayā sarvaduṣkarāṇy utsahasīti//

19

STT:1_24_19

atha sarvārthasiddhir bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvatathāgataiś coditaḥ samānas tataḥ āsphānakasamādhito vyutthāya sarvatathāgatān praṇipatyāhūyaivam āha/ " bhagavantas tathāgatāḥ ājñāpayata !: ’ kathaṃ pratipadyāmi ? kīdṛśaṃ tattvam ?" iti //

Translation

20

STT:1_24_20

evam ukte sarvatathāgatās taṃ bodhisattvam ekakaṇṭhenaivam āhuḥ // " pratipadyasva, kulaputra, svacittapratyavekṣaṇasamādhānena prakṛtisiddhena rucijaptena mantreṇe ! " ’ti// ’ oṃ cittaprativedhaṃ karomi ’ //".

21

STT:1_25_21

atha bodhisattvah sarvatathāgatān evam āha/ " ājñātaṃ me, bhagavantas tathāgatāḥ, svahṛdi candramaṇḍalākāraṃ paśyāmī " ’ti sarvatathāgatāḥ procuḥ : " prakṛtiprabhāsvaram idaṃ, kulaputra, cittam. tad yathā parikarmyate tat tathaiva bhavati // tad yathāpi nāma śvetavastrarāgarañjanam ’ iti /

22

26

31

STT:1_29_31

32

STT:1_30_32

atha sarvatathāgatāḥ punar api tataḥ sarvatathāgatasattvavajrān niḥsṛtyākāśagarbhamahāmaṇiratnābhiṣekeṇābhiṣcyāvalokiteśvaradharmajñānam utpādya, sarvatathāgataviśvakarmatāyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpya,yena sumerugirimūrdhā, yena ca vajramaṇiratnaśikharakūṭāgāras, tenopasaṃkrāntāḥ/ upasaṃkramya vajradhātuṃ tathāgataṃ sarvatathāgatatve ’dhiṣṭhāya, sarvatathāgatasiṃhāsane sarvato mukhaṃ pratiṣṭhāpayām āsur iti //

33

STT:1_31_33

atha khalv akṣobhyas tathāgato, ratnasaṃbhavaś ca tathāgato, lokeśvararājaś ca tathāgato, ’moghasiddhiś ca tathāgataḥ, sarvatathāgatatvaṃ svayam ātmany adhiṣṭhāya bhagavataḥ śākyamunes tathāgatasya sarvasamatāsuprativedhatvāt / sarvadiksamatām adhyālambya catasṛṣu dikṣu niṣaṇṇāḥ//

34

36

STT:1_36_36

athāsmin viniḥsṛtamātre sarvatathāgatahṛdayebhyaḥ sa eva bhagavān samantabhadraś candramaṇḍalāni bhūtvā viniḥsṛtya sarvasattvānāṃ mahābodhicittāni saṃśodhya sarvatathāgatānāṃ sarvapārśveṣv avasthitaḥ/ atha tebhyaś candramaṇḍalebhyaḥ sarvatathāgatajñānavajrāṇi viniḥsṛtya bhagavato vairocanasya tathāgatasya hṛdaye praviṣṭāni/

37

STT:1_36_37

sudṛḍhatvāc ca vajrasattvasamādheḥ sarvatathāgatādhiṣṭhānena caikaghanaḥ sakalākāśadhātusamavasaraṇapramāṇo raśmimālī pañcamūrdhā sarvatathāgatakāyavākcittavajramayo vajravigrahaḥ prādur bhūya, sarvatathāgatahṛdayān niṣkramya pāṇau pratiṣṭhitaḥ/

38

STT:1_36_38

atha tato vajrād vajr’ākārāḥ raśmayo vicitravarṇarūpaḥ sarvalokadhātvābhāsanaspharaṇāh viniścaritāḥ/

Translation

39

STT:1_36_39

tebhyaś ca vajraraśmimukhebhyaḥ sarvalokadhātuparamāṇurajaḥsamās tathāgatavigrahāḥ viniḥsṛtya sakaladharmadhātusamavasaraṇeṣu sarv’ākāśadhātuparyavasāneṣu sarvalokadhātuprasarameghasamudreṣu sarvatathāgatasamantājñānābhijñāsvabhisaṃbodhāt / sarvatathāgatamahābodhicittotpādana,samantabhadravividhacaryāniṣpādana, sarvatathāgatakulārāgaṇa, mahābodhimaṇḍopasaṃkramaṇa,saddharmacakrapravartanādīni yāvad aśeṣānavaśeṣasattvadhātu, paritrāṇa, sarvahitasukha, sarvatathāgatajñānābhijñottamasiddhiniṣpādanādīni sarvatathāgatarddhivikurvitāni saṃdarśya/

Translation

40

STT:1_37_40

samantabhadratvād vajrasattvasamādheḥ, sudṛdhatvāc caikaghanaḥ samantabhadramahābodhisattvakāyaḥ saṃbhūya, bhagavato vairocanasya hṛdaye sthitvedam udānam udānayām āsa// " aho samantabhadro ’ham dṛḍhasattvaḥ svayaṃbhuvām / yad dṛḍhatvād akāyo ’pi sattvakāyatvam āgataḥ "//

41

STT:1_3940_41

atha samantabhadramahābodhisattvakāyo bhagavato hṛdayād avatīrya sarvatathāgatānāṃ purataś candramaṇḍalāśrito bhūtvājñāṃ mārgayām āsa //

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition DHARMA_CritEdSarvatathagatatattvasangraha


42

STT:1_40_42

atha bhagavān sarvatathāgatajñānasamayavajraṃ nāma samādhiṃ samāpadya, sarvatathāgataśīlasamādhiprajñāvimuktivimuktijñānadarśanadharmacakrapravartanasattvārthamahopāyabalavīryamahājñānasamayam, aśeṣānavaśeṣasattvadhātuparitrāṇasarvādhipatyasarvasukhasaumanasyānubhavārthaṃ yāvat sarvatathāgatasamatājñānābhijñānuttaramahāyānābhisamayottamasiddhyavāptiphalahetos, tat sarvatathāgatasiddhivajraṃ tasmai samantabhadrāya mahābodhisattvāya sarvatathāgatacakravartitve sarvabuddhakāyaratnamukuṭapaṭṭābhiṣekeṇabhiṣicya pāṇibhyām anuprādāt/ tataḥ sarvatathāgatair ’ vajrapāṇir vajrapāṇir !! ’ iti vajranāmābhiṣekeṇābhiṣitaḥ //

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition DHARMA_CritEdSarvatathagatatattvasangraha


43

STT:1_40_43

atha vajrapāṇir bodhisattvo mahāsattvo vāmavajragarvollālanatayā tad vajraṃ svahṛdy utkarṣaṇayogena dhārayann idam udānam udānayām āsa // " idaṃ tat sarvabuddhānāṃ siddhivajram anuttaram / ahaṃ mama kare dattaṃ vajraṃ vajrapratiṣṭhitam " iti // //

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition DHARMA_CritEdSarvatathagatatattvasangraha


44

STT:1_41_44

atha bhagavām punar apy amogharājamahābodhisattvasamayasaṃbhavasattvādhiṣṭhānavajraṃ nāma samādhiṃ samāpadyedaṃ sarvatathāgatahṛdayaṃ svahṛdayān niścacāra // ’ vajrarāja ’//

Translation

45

STT:1_41_45

athāsmin viniḥsṛtamātre sarvatathāgatahṛdayebhyaḥ sa eva bhagavān vajrapāṇiḥ sarvatathāgatamahāṅkuśāni bhūtvā viniḥsṛtya, bhagavato vairocanasya hṛdaye praviṣṭavaikaghano vajrāṅkuśamahāvigrahaḥ prādurbhūya, bhagavataḥ pāṇau pratiṣṭhitaḥ/

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition DHARMA_CritEdSarvatathagatatattvasangraha


46

STT:1_41_46

atha tato vajrāṅkuśamahāvigrahāt / sarvalokadhātuparamāṇurājaḥsamās tathāgatavigrahāḥ viniḥsṛtya, sarvatathāgatākarṣaṇādīni sarvabuddharddhivikurvitāni kṛtvā, svamogharājatvād vajrasattvasamādheḥ sudṛḍhatvāc caikaghano ’mogharājamahābodhisattvakāyaḥ saṃbhūya bhagavato vairocanasya hṛdaye sthitvedam udānam udānayām āsa // " aho hy amogharāja ’haṃ vajrasaṃbhavam aṅkuśaḥ / yat sarvavyāpino buddhāḥ samākṛṣyanti siddhaya " iti //

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition DHARMA_CritEdSarvatathagatatattvasangraha


47

STT:1_42_47

atha so ’mogharājamahābodhisattvakāyo bhagavato hṛdayād avatīrya, sarvatathāgatānāṃ dakṣiṇacandramaṇḍal’āśrito bhūtvā punar apy ājñānaṃ mārgayām āsa //

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition DHARMA_CritEdSarvatathagatatattvasangraha


48

STT:1_4243_48

atha bhagavān sarvatathāgatākarṣaṇasamayavajraṃ nāma samādhiṃ samāpadya, sarvatathāgatākarṣaṇasamayam, aśeṣānavaśeṣasattvadhātusarvākarṣaṇasarva sukhasaumanasyānubhavanārthaṃ yāvat sarvatathāgatasamājādhiṣṭhānottamasiddhyarthaṃ tad vajrāṅkuśaṃ tasmā amogharājāya mahābodhisattvāya tathaiva pāṇibhyām anuprādāt/ tataḥ sarvatathāgatair ’ vajrākarṣo vajr’ākarṣaḥ !! ’ iti vajranāmābhiṣekeṇābhiṣiktaḥ/ atha vajrākarṣo bodhisattvas tena vajrāṅkuśena sarvatathāgatān ākarṣayann idam udānam udānayām āsa //: " idaṃ tat sarvabuddhānāṃ vajrajñānam anuttaram / yat sarvabuddhārthasiddhyarthaṃ samākarṣaṇam uttamam " iti // // atha bhagavān punar api māramahābodhisattvasamayasaṃbhavasattvādhiṣṭhānavajraṃ nāma samādhiṃ samāpadyedaṃ sarvatathāgatānurāgaṇasamayaṃ nāma sarvatathāgatahṛdayaṃ svahṛdayān niścacāra // ’ vajrarāga ’//

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition DHARMA_CritEdSarvatathagatatattvasangraha


51

STT:1_43_51

athāsmin viniḥsṛtamātre sarvatathāgatahṛdayebhyaḥ sa eva bhagavān vajradharaḥ sarvatathāgatakusumānyudhāni bhūtvā viniḥsṛtya bhagavato vairocanasya hṛdaye praviṣṭaikaghano mahāvajravāṇavigrahaḥ prādur bhūya pāṇau pratiṣṭhitaḥ/

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition DHARMA_CritEdSarvatathagatatattvasangraha


52

STT:1_44_52

atha tato vajravāṇavigrahāt sarvalokadhātuparamāṇurajaḥsamās tathāgatavigrahā viniḥsṛtya sarvatathāgatānurāgaṇādīni sarvabuddharddhivikurvitāni kṛtvā, sumāraṇatāvad vajrasattvasamādheḥ sudṛḍhatvāc caikaghano māramahābodhisattvakāyaḥ saṃbhūya bhagavato vairocanasya hṛdaye sthitvedam udānam udānayām āha // " aho svabhāvaśuddho ’ham anurāgaḥ svayaṃbhuvām / yac chuddhyarthaṃ viraktānāṃ rāgeṇa vinayanti hi //"

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition DHARMA_CritEdSarvatathagatatattvasangraha


53

STT:1_44_53

atha sa māramahābodhisattvakāyo bhagavato hṛdayād avatīrya sarvatathāgatānāṃ vāmacandramaṇḍalāśrito bhūtvā, punar apy ājñāṃ mārgayām āsa //

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition DHARMA_CritEdSarvatathagatatattvasangraha


54

STT:1_44_54

atha bhagavān sarvatathāgatānurāgaṇādhiṣṭhānavajraṃ nāma samādhiṃ samāpadya, sarvatathāgatamāraṇavajrasamayam aśeṣānavaśeṣasattvadhāṭvanurāgaṇasarvasukhasaumanasyānubhavanārthaṃ yāvat sarvatathāgatamārakarmottamasiddhyavāptiphalahetos tad vajravāṇaṃ tasmai mārāya mahābodhisattvāya tathaiva pāṇibhyām anuprādāt/ tataḥ sarvatathāgatair ’ vajradhanur vajradhanur !! ’ iti vajranāmābhiṣekeṇābhisiktaḥ/

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition DHARMA_CritEdSarvatathagatatattvasangraha


55

STT:1_44_55

atha vajradhanur bodhisattvo mahāsattvas tena vajravāṇena sarvatathāgatān mārayann idam udanam udānayām āsa // " idaṃ tat sarvabuddhānāṃ rāgajñānam anāvilam / hatvā virāgaṃ rāgeṇa sarvasaukhyaṃ dadanti hi // //

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition DHARMA_CritEdSarvatathagatatattvasangraha


56

STT:1_45_56

atha bhagavān punar api prāmodyarājamahābodhisattvasamayasaṃbhavasattvādhiṣṭhānavajraṃ nāma samādhiṃ samāpadyedaṃ sarvatathāgatapramodasamayaṃ nāma sarvatathāgatahṛdayaṃ svahṛdayān niścacāra // ’ vajrasādhu ’//

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition DHARMA_CritEdSarvatathagatatattvasangraha


57

STT:1_45_57

athāsmin viniḥsṛtamātre sarvatathāgatahṛdayebhyaḥ sa eva bhagavān vajradharaḥ sādhukārāṇi bhūtvā bhagavato vairocanasya hṛdaye praviṣṭaikaghano bhūtvā vajratuṣṭivigrahaḥ prādur bhūya, bhagavataḥ pāṇau pratiṣṭhitaḥ/

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition DHARMA_CritEdSarvatathagatatattvasangraha


58

STT:1_45_58

atha tato vajratuṣṭivigrahaḥ sarvalokadhātuparamāṇuparamāṇurājaḥsamās tathāgatavigrahā viniḥsṛtya, sarvatathāgatasādhukār’ādīni sarvabuddharddhivikurvitāni kṛtvā, supramodyatvād vajrasattvasamādheḥ sudṛḍhatvāc caikaghanaḥ prāmodyarājamahābodhisattvakāyaḥ saṃbhūya, bhagavato vairocanasya tathāgatasya hṛdaye sthitvedam udānam udānayām āsa // " aho hi sādhukāro ’haṃ sarvaḥ sarvavidāṃ varaḥ / yad vikalpaprahīṇānāṃ tuṣṭiṃ janayate dhruvam " //

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition DHARMA_CritEdSarvatathagatatattvasangraha


59

STT:1_45_59

atha sa prāmodyarājamahābodhisattvakāyo bhagavato vairocanasya hṛdayād avatīrya, sarvatathāgatānāṃ pṛṣṭhataś candramaṇḍalāśrito bhūtvā, punar apy ājñāṃ mārgayām āsa //

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition DHARMA_CritEdSarvatathagatatattvasangraha


60

STT:1_4546_60

atha bhagavān sarvatathāgatasaṃtoṣaṇavajraṃ nāma samādhiṃ samāpadya sarvatathāgatānuttaraprāmodyajñānasamayam aśeṣānavaśeṣasattvadhātusarvasattvasaṃtoṣaṇamahāsukhasaumanasyānubhavanārthaṃ yāvat sarvatathāgatānuttaraharṣarasottamasiddhiprāptiphalahetos tad vajratuṣṭiṃ tasmai prāmodyarājāya mahābodhisattvāya tathaiva pāṇibhyām anuprādāt /. tataḥ sarvatathāgatair ’ vajraharṣo vajraharṣa !! ’ iti vajranāmābhiṣekeṇābhiṣiktaḥ/

Translation

61

64

STT:1_47_64

athāsmin viniḥsṛtamātresarvatathāgatahṛdayebhyaḥ sarvākāśasamatājñānasuprativedhatvād vajrasattvasamādheḥ sa eva bhagavān vajradharaḥ sarvākāśaraśmayo bhūtvā viniḥsṛtāḥ /. taiḥ sarvākāśaraśmibhiḥ sarvalokadhātavo ’vabhāsitāḥ / sarvākāśadhātumayāḥ saṃvṛttā abhūvān//

65

STT:1_47_65

atha sarvatathāgatādhiṣṭhānena *sarvo ’sāv ākāśasarvāsāvākāśādhātur bhagavato vairocanasya hṛdaye pratiṣṭaḥ/ suparibhāvitatvāc ca vajrasattvasamādheḥ sarvākāśadhātugarbhamayaḥ, sarvalokadhātusamavasaraṇa*pramāṇopramāṇā mahāvajraratnavigrahaḥ prādur bhūya/ bhagavataḥ pāṇau pratiṣṭhitaḥ /

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition DHARMA_CritEdSarvatathagatatattvasangraha


66

STT:1_47_66

atha tasmād vajraratnavigrahāt sarvalokadhātuparamāṇurajaḥsamās tathāgatavigrahāḥ prādurbhūya sarvatathāgatābhiṣekādīni sarvatathāgatarddhivikurvitāni sarvalokadhātuṣu kṛtvā sarvākāśadhātugarbhasusaṃbhavatvād vajrasattvasamādheḥ sudṛḍhatvāc caikaghana ākāśagarbhamahābodhisattvakāyaḥ saṃbhūya bhagavato vairocanasya hṛdaye sthitvedam udānam udānayām āsa // " aho hi svabhiṣeko ’haṃ vajraratnam anuttaram / yan niḥsaṅgā api jinās tridhātupatayaḥ smṛtāḥ " //

67

68

STT:1_4849_68

atha bhagavān sarvatathāgatamaṇiratnavajraṃ nāma samādhiṃ samāpadya, sarvatathāgatābhiprāyaparipūraṇasamayam aśeṣānavaśeṣasattvadhātusarvārthapariprāptisarvasukhasaumanasyānubhavanārthaṃ yāvat sarvatathāgatārthasaṃpaduttamasiddhiprāptyai tad vajramaṇiṃ tasmā ākāśagarbhāya mahābodhisattvāya vajraratnacakravartitve vajraratnāṅkuśābhiṣekeṇābhiṣicya pāṇibhyām anuprādāt/ tataḥ sarvatathāgatair ’ vajragarbho vajragarbha !! 72

STT:1_50_72

atha tato vajrasūryamaṇḍalāt sarvalokadhātuparamāṇurajaḥsamās tathāgatavigrahā viniḥsṛtya, sarvatathāgataraśmipramāñcan’ādīni sarvatathāgatarddhivikurvitāni kṛtvā, sumahātejastvād vajrasattvasamādheḥ sudṛḍhatvāc caikaghano mahātejamahābodhisattvakāyaḥ saṃbhūya, bhagavato vairocanasya hṛdaye sthitvedam udānam udānayām āsa // " aho hy anupamaṃ tejaḥ sattvadhātvavabhāsanam / yac chodhayati śuddhānāṃ buddhānām api tāyinām " //

STT:1_5051_732

77

STT:1_52_77

91

STT:1_56_91

atha tasmād vajrapadmavigrahāt / sarvalokadhātuparamāṇurajahsamās tathāgatavigrahā viniḥsṛtya sarvatathāgatasamādhijñānābhijñādīni sarvabuddhārddhivikurvitāni sarvalokadhātuṣu kṛtvā svavalokanaiśvaryatvād vajrasattvasamādheḥ sudṛḍhatvāc caikaghano ’valokiteśvaramahābodhisattvakāyaḥ saṃbhūya bhagavato vairocanasya tathāgatasya hṛdaye sthitvedam udānam udānayām āsa // " aho hi paramārtho ’haṃ ādiśuddhaḥ svayaṃbhuvām / yat kolopamadharmāṇāṃ viśuddhir upalabhyate " //

Translation

92

STT:1_57_92

atha so ’valokiteśvaramahābodhisattvakāyo bhagavato vairocanasya hṛdayād avatīrya, sarvatathāgatānāṃ purataś candramaṇḍalāśrito bhūtvā punar apy ājñāṃ mārgayām āsa //

93

STT:1_57_93

atha bhagavān sarvatathāgatasamādhijñānasamayavajraṃ nāma samādhiṃ samāpadya, sarvatathāgataviśodhanasamayam aśeṣānvaśeṣasattvātmapariśuddhisarvasukhasaumanasyānubhavanārthaṃ yāvat sarvatathāgatadharmajñānābhijñāvāptiphalahetos tad vajrapadmaṃ tasmā avalokiteśvarāya mahābodhisattvāya saddharmacakravartitve sarvatathāgatadharmakāyābhiṣekeṇabhiṣicya pāṇibhyām anuprādāt/ tataḥ sarvatathāgatair ’ vajranetro vajranetra !! ’ iti vajranāmābhiṣekeṇābhiṣiktaḥ/

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition DHARMA_CritEdSarvatathagatatattvasangraha


94

STT:1_57_94

atha vajranetro bodhisattvo mahāsattvas tad vajrapadmaṃ pattravikāsanatayā rāgaviśuddhinirlepasvabhāvāvalokanatayā ’valokayann idam udānam udānayām āsa // " idaṃ tat sarvabuddhānāṃ rāgatattvāvabodhanam / ahaṃ mama kare dattaṃ dharmaṃ dharmapratiṣṭhitam " iti // //

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition DHARMA_CritEdSarvatathagatatattvasangraha


95

STT:1_58_95

atha bhagavān punar api mañjuśrīmahābodhisattvasamayasaṃbhavadharmādhiṣṭhānavajraṃ nāma samādhiṃ samāpadyedaṃ sarvatathāgatamahāprajñājñānasamayaṃ nāma sarvatathāgatahṛdayaṃ svahṛdayān niścacāra // ’ vajratīkṣṇa ’ //

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition DHARMA_CritEdSarvatathagatatattvasangraha


96

STT:1_5859_96

athāsmin viniḥsṛtamātre sarvatathāgatahṛdayebhyaḥ sa eva bhagavān vajradharaḥ prajñāśatrāṇi bhūtvā viniḥsṛtya, bhagavato vairocanasya hṛdaye praviṣṭvaikaghano vajrakośavigrahaḥ prādurbhūya bhagavataḥ pāṇau pratiṣṭhitaḥ/

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition DHARMA_CritEdSarvatathagatatattvasangraha


97

STT:1_59_97

atha tato vajrakośavigrahāt sarvalokadhātuparamāṇurajaḥsamās tathāgatavigrahā viniścaritvā sarvatathāgataprajñājñānādīni sarvabhuddharddhivikurvitāni kṛtvā, sumañjuśriyatvād vajrasattvasamādheḥ sudṛḍhatvāc caikaghano mañjuśrīmahābodhisattvakāyaḥ saṃbhūya bhagavato vairocanasya hṛdaye sthitvedam udānam udānayām āsa // " aho hi sarvabuddhānāṃ mañjughoṣam ahaṃ smṛtaḥ // yat prajñāyā arūpiṇyā ghoṣattvam upalabhyate " //

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition DHARMA_CritEdSarvatathagatatattvasangraha


98

STT:1_59_98

atha sa mañjuśrīmahābodhisattvakāyo bhagavato hṛdayād avatīrya sarvatathāgatānāṃ dakṣiṇacandramaṇḍal’āśrito bhūtvā, punar apy ājñāṃ mārgayām āsa //

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition DHARMA_CritEdSarvatathagatatattvasangraha


99

STT:1_60_99

atha bhagavan sarvatathāgataprajñājñānavajraṃ nāma samādhiṃ samāpadya, sarvatathāgatakleśacchedanasamayam aśeṣānavaśeṣasattvadhātusarvaduḥkhacchedanasarvasukhasaumanasyānubhavanārthaṃ yāvat sarvatathāgataghoṣānugaprajñāpāripūryuttamasiddhyarthaṃ tad vajrakośaṃ tasmai mañjuśriye mahābodhisattvāya tathaiva pāṇibhyām anuprādāt/. tataḥ sarvatathāgatair ’ vajrabuddhir vajrabuddhir !! ’ iti vajranāmābhiṣekeṇābhiṣiktaḥ/

Translation

100

STT:1_60_100

atha sa vajrabuddhir bodhisattvo mahāsattvas tena vajrakośena sarvatathāgatān praharann idam udānam udānayām āsa // " idaṃ tat sarvabuddhānāṃ prajñāpāramitānayam / chettāraṃ sarvaśatrūṇāṃ sarvapāpaharaṃ param " iti // //

102

103

STT:1_61_103

109

110

115

STT:1_67_115

athāsmin viniḥsṛtamātre sarvatathāgatahṛdayebhyaḥ sarvakarmasamatājñānasuprativedhatvād vajrasattvasamādheḥ sa eva bhagavān vajradharaḥ sarvatathāgatakarmaraśmayo bhūtvā viniḥsṛtāḥ/ taiś ca sarvatathāgatakarmaraśmibhiḥ sarvalokadhātavo ’vabhāsitāḥ sarvatathāgatakarmadhātumayāḥ saṃvṛttāḥ sa sakalaḥ sarvatathāgatakarmadhātur bhagavato vairocanasya hṛdaye praviṣṭvā, sarv’ākāśadhātusamavasaraṇapramāṇas, tataḥ sarvatathāgatakarmadhātutaḥ, karmavajravigrahaḥ prādurbhūya bhagavataḥ pāṇau pratiṣṭhitaḥ/

Translation

116

STT:1_6768_116

atha tataḥ karmavajravigrahāt sarvalokadhātuparamāṇurajaḥsamās tathāgatavigrahā viniḥsṛtya, sarvalokadhātuṣu sarvatathāgatakarm’ādīni sarvabuddharddhivikurvitāni kṛtvā, sarvatathāgatānantakarmatvād vajrasattvasamādheḥ sudṛḍhatvāc caikaghanaḥ sarvatathāgataviśvakarmamahābodhisattvakāyaḥ saṃbhūya, bhagavato vairocanasya hṛdaye sthitvedam udānam udānayām āsa // " aho hy amoghaṃ buddhānāṃ sarvakarmam ahaṃ bahu / yad anābhogabuddhārthaṃ vajrakarma pravartate " //

Translation

117

STT:1_7374_130

No translation available yet for this part of the edition DHARMA_CritEdSarvatathagatatattvasangraha


133

STT:1_75_133

athāsmin vinihṛtamātre sarvatathāgatahṛdayebhyaḥ sa eva bhagavān vajradharaḥ sarvatathāgatasarvamudryābandhā bhūtvā viniḥsṛtya bhagavato vairocanasya hṛdaye praviṣṭvaikaghano vajrabandhavigrahaḥ prādur bhūhya pāṇau pratiṣṭhitaḥ/

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition DHARMA_CritEdSarvatathagatatattvasangraha


134

STT:1_7576_134

atha tato vajrabandhavigrahāt sarvalokadhātuparamāṇurajaḥsamās tathāgatavigrahā viniścaritvā, sarvalokadhātuṣu sarvatathāgatamudrājñānādīni sarvabuddharddhivikurvitāni kṛtvā, sarvatathāgatamahāmuṣṭisubandhatvād vajrasattvasamādheḥ sudṛḍhatvāc caikaghanaḥ sarvatathāgatamuṣṭimahābodhisattvakāyaḥ saṃbhūya bhagavato vairocanasya hṛdaye sthitvedam udānam udānayām āha // aho hi sudṛḍhabandhaḥ samayo ’haṃ dṛḍhātmanām / yat sarvāśāprasidhyarthaṃ muktānām api bandhanam //

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition DHARMA_CritEdSarvatathagatatattvasangraha


135

STT:1_76_135

atha sarvatathāgatamuṣṭimahābodhisattvakāyo bhagavato hṛdayād avatīrya sarvatathāgatānāṃ pṛṭhataś candramaṇḍalāśrito bhūtvā punar apy ājñāṃ mārgāyam āsa //

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition DHARMA_CritEdSarvatathagatatattvasangraha


136

STT:1_76_136

atha bhagavān sarvatathāgatasamayavajraṃ nāma samādhiṃ samāpadya, sarvatathāgatadevatāsānnidhyakalpanāsarvasiddhisukhasaumanasyānubhavanārthaṃ yāvat sarvatathāgatasarvajñajñānamudrādhipatyottamasiddhiphalahetos tad vajrabandhaṃ tasmai sarvatathāgatamuṣṭaye mahābodhisattvāya tathaiva pāṇibhyām anuprādāt/. tataḥ sarvatathāgatair vajramuṣṭir vajramuṣṭir iti vajranāmābhiṣekeṇābhiṣiktaḥ //.

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition DHARMA_CritEdSarvatathagatatattvasangraha


137

STT:1_76_137

atha vajramuṣṭir bodhisattvo mahāsattvas tena vajrabandhena sarvatathāgatān bandhayann idam udānam udānayām āsa // idaṃ tat sarvabuddhānāṃ muṣṭibandhaṃ mahādṛḍham / yat sarvabuddhās tu siddhyarthaṃ samayo duratikrama iti // //

139

STT:1_78_139

atha khalv akṣobhyas tathāgato bhagavato vairocanasya sarvatathāgatajñānāni niṣpādya, sarvatathāgatajñānamudraṇārthaṃ vajrapāramitāsamayodbhavavajrādhiṣṭhānaṃ nāma samādhiṃ samāpadyemāṃ sarvatathāgatavajrasamayāṃ nāma sarvatathāgatamudrāṃ svahṛdayān niścacāra // sattvavajri//

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition DHARMA_CritEdSarvatathagatatattvasangraha


140

STT:1_78_140

athāsyāṃ viniḥsṛtamātrāyāṃ sarvatathāgatahṛdayebhyo vajraraśmayo viniścaritāḥ/ tebhyaś ca vajraraśmibhyaḥ sa eva bhagavān vajradharaḥ sarvalokadhātuparamāṇurajaḥsamās tathāgatavigrahā bhūtvā, sarvatathāgatavajrapāramitājñānāny āmudrya, punar apy ekaghanaḥ sarvalokadhātusamavasaraṇapramāṇo mahāvajravigrahaḥ prādurbhūya, bhagavato vairocanasya purataś candramaṇḍalāśrito bhūtvedam udānam udānayām āsa//:

aho hi sarvabuddhānāṃ sattvavajram ahaṃ dṛḍhaḥ / yad dṛdhatvād akāyo vajrakāyatvam āgata iti //

179

STT:1_95_179

athāsmin viniḥsṛtamātre sarvatathāgatahṛdayebhyaḥ gaṇā bhūtvā viniḥsṛtāḥ/ tebhyaś ca sarvatathāgatamudrāgaṇebhyaḥ sarvalokadhātuparamāṇurajaḥsamās tathāgatavigrahā viniḥsṛtya, punar apy ekaghano vajrāṅkuśamahābodhisattvakāyaḥ saṃbhūya, bhagavato vajramaṇiratnaśikharakūṭāgārasya vajradvāramadhye candramaṇḍalāśrito bhūtvā, sarvatathāgatasamayān ākarṣayann idam udānam udānayām āsa //

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition DHARMA_CritEdSarvatathagatatattvasangraha


180

STT:1_95_180

aho hi sarvabuddhānāṃ samākarṣam aham dṛḍhaḥ / yan mayā hi samākṛṣṭā bhajante sarvamaṇḍalam iti //

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition DHARMA_CritEdSarvatathagatatattvasangraha


181

STT:1_96_181

atha bhagavān punar api sarvatathāgatasamayapraveśamahāsattvasamayasaṃbhavavajraṃ nāma samādhiṃ samāpadyemaṃ sarvatathāgatamudrāpraveśapratīhāraṃ svahṛdayān niścacāra // vajrapāśa //

182

STT:1_96_182

195

STT:1_102_195

aho hi sarvabuddhānāṃ mahaudāryam anādijam / yat sarvāṇuprasaṃkhyā vai buddhā hy ekatvam āgatā iti // atha bhagavataḥ arvatathāgatāḥ punar api samājam āgamyāsya vajradhātumahāmaṇḍalasyādhiṣṭhānāyāśeṣānavaśeṣasya ca sattvadhātoḥ paritrāṇasarvahitasukhāvāptyai yāvat sarvatathāgatasamatājñānābhijñābhisaṃbodhyuttamasiddhaye, bhagavantaṃ sarvatathāgatādhipatiṃ svavajrasattvam anādinidhanaṃ mahāvajradharam anena nāmāṣṭaśatenādhyeṣitavantaḥ //

197

STT:1_104_197

201

STT:1_106_201

yaḥ kaścid dhārayen nāmnām idaṃ te ’ṣṭaśataṃ śivam / vajranāmābhiṣekādyaiḥ sarvāgraiḥ so ’bhiṣicyate // yas tu gauṇam idaṃ nāmnāṃ mahāvajradharasya tu / śaśvad gāyan stuyāt so ’pi bhaved vajradharopamaḥ // anenābhiṣṭuto ’smābhir nāmnām aṣṭaśatena tu / mahāyānābhisamayaṃ visphāraya mahānayaṃ // adhyeṣayāmas tvāṃ nātha bhāṣasva paramaṃ vidhim / sarvabuddhamahācakraṃ mahāmaṇḍalam uttamam iti //

203

STT:1_110_203

204

208

STT:1_114_208

sattvavajrāṅkuśīṃ baddhvā vajrācāryas tataḥ punaḥ / kurvann acchaṭasaṃghātaṃ sarvabuddhān samājayet // tat kṣaṇaṃ sarvabuddhās tu vajrasattvasamanvitāḥ / sarvamaṇḍalasaṃpūrṇāḥ samājaṃ yānti maṇḍale // tataḥ śīghraṃ mahāmudrāṃ bhāvya vajradharasya tu / uccārayet sakṛdvāraṃ nāmāṣṭaśatam uttamam // tatas tuṣṭāḥ samājena dṛḍhaṃ yānti tathāgatāḥ / vajrasattvaḥ svayaṃ siddho mitratvenopatiṣṭhati //

209

STT:1_114_209

tato dvāreṣu sarveṣu karma kṛtvāṅkuśādibhiḥ / mahākarmāgryamudrābhiḥ samayāṃs tu niveśayet // mudrābhiḥ samayāgryābhiḥ sattvavajrādibhis tathā / sādhyeta mahāsattvāñ jaḥ hūṃ vaṃ hoḥ pravartayan // tato buddhādayaḥ sarve mahāsattvāḥ samājataḥ / ākṛṣṭāḥ supraviṣṭāś ca baddhā yasyanti tadvaśam // tatas tu guhyapūjābhiḥ saṃtoṣya sa mahātmanām / vijñāpet sarvasattvārthaṃ kurudhvaṃ sarvasiddhaya iti // evaṃ sarvamaṇḍaleṣu vajrācāryakarmeti //

210

STT:1_119_210

athātra vajradhātumahāmaṇḍale vajraśiṣyapraveśādividhivistaro bhavati/ tatra prathamaṃ tāvat praveśo bhavaty aśeṣānavaśeṣasattvadhātuparitrāṇasarvahitasukhottamasiddhikāryakaraṇatayā/ atra mahāmaṇḍalapraveśe pātrāpātraparīkṣā na kāryā. tat kasmād dhetoḥ:

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition DHARMA_CritEdSarvatathagatatattvasangraha


211

STT:1_119_211

santi, bhagavantas tathāgatāḥ, kecit sattvā mahāpāpakāriṇas, ta idaṃ vajradhātumahāmaṇḍalaṃ dṛṣṭvā praviṣṭvā ca, sarvāpāyavigatā bhaviṣyanti/ santi ca, bhagavantaḥ, sattvāḥ sarvārthabhojanapānakāmaguṇagṛddhāḥ, samayadviṣṭāḥ puraścaraṇādiṣv aśaktāḥ/ teṣām apy atra yathākāmakaraṇīyatayā praviṣṭānāṃ sarvāśāparipūrir bhaviṣyati/

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition DHARMA_CritEdSarvatathagatatattvasangraha


212

STT:1_119120_212

santi ca, bhagavantaḥ, sattvāḥ nṛttagāyavihārapriyatayā sarvatathāgatamahāyānābhisamayadharmatānavabodhatvād anyadevakulamaṇḍalāni praviśanti, sarvāśāparipūrisaṃgrahabhūteṣu niruttararatiprītiharṣasaṃbhavakareṣu sarvatathāgatakulamaṇḍaleṣu, śikṣāpadabhayabhītā na praviśanti/ teṣām apāyamaṇḍalapraveśapathāvasthitamukhānām ayam eva vajradhātumahāmaṇḍalapraveśo yujyate/ sarvaratiprītiuttamasiddhisukhasaumanasyānubhavanārthaṃ sarvāpāyapratipraveśābhimukhapathavinivartanāya ca/

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition DHARMA_CritEdSarvatathagatatattvasangraha


213

STT:1_120_213

STT:1_123_220

221

STT:1_123_221

tataḥ svayaṃ vajrācāryaḥ sattvavajrimudrām avamūrdhamukhīṃ baddhvā vajraśiṣyasya mūrdhni sthāpyaivaṃ vadet/ ayaṃ te samayavajro mūrdhānaṃ sphālayed, yadi tvaṃ kasya cid brūyāt/ tatas tathaiva samayamudrayodakaṃ śapathāhṛdayena sakṛt parijāpya tasmai śiṣyāya pāyayed iti/

253

STT:1_145_253

265

STT:1_156_265

athātaḥ saṃpravakṣyāmi tathāgatakulasya hi / samayagrāhikāmudrābandhaṃ siddhiṃ ca karma ca // pāṇidvayamaye candre madhyamāṅgulivarjite / antyāṅgulimukhāsaṅgād vajraṃ vai sattvavajrayā //

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition DHARMA_CritEdSarvatathagatatattvasangraha

307

STT:1_203_307

315

317

STT:1_215_317

tato yathāpraviṣṭān saṃpreṣya sarvatathāgatān vijñāpayet / sarvavajrimudrāṃ baddhvorddhvato muñced, idaṃ ca hṛdayam uccārayet/ oṃ kṛto vaḥ sarvasattvārthaḥ siddhir dattā yathānugā / gacchadhvaṃ buddhaviṣayaṃ punar āgamanāya tu // vajrasattva muḥ // evaṃ sarvamaṇḍaleṣu kartavyaṃ, samayāgryamudrāsu ca mokṣa iti //

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition DHARMA_CritEdSarvatathagatatattvasangraha

atha ta evam āhuḥ/ saṃbuddhadharmasaṃghasamudrāñ charaṇaṃ gacchāmaḥ / tvacchāsanājñāṃ na jānīma iti //

atha vajrapāṇir mahābodhisattvas tān apāyabhūmipratitān sarvasattvān āhūyaivam āha/ paritrāyasva no bhagavann asmād vyasanasaṃkaṭāt / eṣa vayaṃ buddhaṃ dharmaṃ saṃghaṃ tvāṃ ca śaraṇaṃ gacchāma iti //

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition DHARMA_CritEdSarvatathagatatattvasangraha


840

STT:1_383_840

atha ta ekakaṇṭhenaivam āhuḥ/ paritrāyasva no bhagavann asmād vyasanasaṃkaṭāt / eṣa vayaṃ buddhaṃ dharmaṃ saṅhaṃ tvāṃ ca śaraṇaṃ gacchāma iti //

909

STT:1_399_909

athāsāṃ jñānamudrāṇāṃ hṛdayāni bhavanti // huṃ sattvavajrakrodhāviśa aḥ // ho ratnavajrakrodhavaśam ānaya tram // huṃ vajradharmakrodha phaṭ // haṃ karmavajrakrodha rakṣa //

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition DHARMA_CritEdSarvatathagatatattvasangraha

1129

1202

STT:1_489_1202

atha vajrapāṇiḥ sarvatathāgatān āhūyaivam āha // adhitiṣṭhata, bhagavantaḥ sarvatathāgatā mamedaṃ kulaṃ, yena sarvasattvā yathākāmakaraṇīyatayā sarvasiddhīḥ prāpnuyur iti //

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition DHARMA_CritEdSarvatathagatatattvasangraha

STT:?_2_1499

athāsmin bhāṣitamātre āryāvalokiteśvarahṛdayāt sa eva bhagavān vajradharaḥ āryāvalokiteśvararūpadhāriṇaḥ padmapratiṣṭhāḥ padmamudrācihnadhārivicitravarṇarūpaveśālaṃkārāḥ tathāgatādisarvasattvamūrtidharā mahābodhisattvavigrahā bhūtvā viniḥsṛtya,

Translation

1557

STT:?_2_1557

ākāśe vānyadeśe vā vajrapadmaṃ tu bhāvayet / taṃ tu gṛhṇan kṣaṇāc caiva padmavidyādharo bhavet //

No translation available yet for this part of the edition DHARMA_CritEdSarvatathagatatattvasangraha


1558

STT:?_2_1558

tatraiṣāṃ hṛdayāni bhavanti // oṃ sarvajagadvaśitājñānapadmāviśa aḥ // oṃ jñānapadma tiṣṭhādreśyaṃ kuru vaṃ // oṃ samādhiviśvapadma tiṣṭha viśvarūpyaṃ darśa bhagavan dhaḥ // oṃ samādhivajrapadmaṃ tiṣṭhottiṣṭha śīghraṃ hrīḥ // loke.varaṃ samīlikhya maṇḍalādiṣu sarvataḥ / puras tasya samākarṣet hayagrīvāgryamudrayā // lokeśvaraṃ samālikhya maṇḍalādiṣu tasya vai / amoghapāśamudrayā vaśīkuryāj jagat sa tu // lokeśvaraṃ samālikhya maṇḍalādiṣu tasya vai / amoghapāśamudrayā vaśīkuryāj jagat sa tu // loke.varaṃ samālkijya maṇḍalādiṣu sarvataḥ / puras tasya tu bandhnīyāt padmasphoṭāgramudrayā // lokeśvaraṃ samālikhya maṇḍalādiṣu tasya vai / purataḥ padmaghaṇṭayā sarvāveśanam uttamam iti // tatraiṣāṃ hṛdayāni bhavanti // oṃ padmāṅkuśākarṣaya sarvamahāsattvān hūṃ jjaḥ // oṃ amoghapāśakrodha hūṃ hoḥ // oṃ padmasphoṭa vaṃ // oṃ padmaghaṇṭāveśaya sarvam aḥ // catuḥpadmamukhaṃ sattvaṃ bhāvayan svayam ātmanā / svam ātmānaṃ tataḥ siddho bahurūpī bhavet kṣanāt // bhāvayan padmapadmaṃ tu svam ātmānaṃ tathātmanā / vajradharmasamādhistho prāpnoti padam akṣaram // lokeśvarajaṭāmadhye bhāvayan svayam ātmanā / buddhabimbaṃ svam ātmānam amitāyuḥsamo bhavet // bhāvayan svayam ātmanā viśvarūpasamādhinā / viśvarūpasamādhistho lokeśvarasamo bhaved iti // tatraiṣāṃ hṛdayāni bhavanti // padmaviśva / dharmakāyapadma / buddhābhiṣeka / lokeśvara // tato mahāmaṇḍalasarvamudrājñānaṃ śikṣayet // tatra prathamaṃ tāvan mahāmudrājñānaṃ bhavati // candramaṇḍalamadhyasthān yathālekhyānusārataḥ / padmapratiṣṭhasattvān svaṃ bhāvayet svayam ātmaneti // athāsāṃ karma bhavati // baddhvā buddhamahāmudrām amitāyusamo bhavet / vajrapadmaṃ samādhāya lokeśvarasamo bhavet // buddhābhiṣekaṃ baddhvā vai sugataiḥ so ’bhiṣicyate / padmapadmā samādhiṃ tu dadyād viśvā suvaiśvatām // vaiśvarūpyaṃ vineyāṃs tu buddharatnābhiṣekadaḥ / padmasattvisamādhiṃ tu padmakrodheśvarīṃ śriyam // vajralokeśvarīṃ siddhim uttamāṃ padmarāgiṇīm / buddheśvarī tu buddhatvaṃ vajrapadmā susiddhidā // kāmeśvarī surāgitvaṃ dadyāt tuṣṭiṃ tu sādhutā / bhṛkutiḥ krodhaśamarī padmasūryā sutejadā // padmacandrā mahākāntiṃ dadyād dhāsā suhāsatām / tarayā cottarā siddhiḥ saubhāgyaṃ padma khaḍgayā // nīlakaṇṇthā mahākarṣā siddhiṃ paṇḍalavāsinī / padmanatreśvarī siddhim abhayā abhayaṃdadā // pracaṇḍā duṣṭadamanī padmamuṣṭiḥ susādhikā / lāsyā ratiṃ dhanaṃ mālā svaraṃ gītā sukhaṃ nṛtyā // dhūpā hlādaṃ sukhaṃ puṣpā dīpā dṛṣṭiṃ gandhā sugandhatām / hayagrīvā samākarṣā amoghā tu vaśaṃkarī //

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition DHARMA_CritEdSarvatathagatatattvasangraha


1580

STT:?_2_1580

padmasphoṭā mahābandhā sarvāveśā tu ghaṇṭiketi // tataḥ padmakulasamayamudrājñānaṃ bhavati // vajrabandhaṃ samādhāya samāṅguṣṭhāntyasañjanāt / mudreyaṃ dharmasamayā buddhadharmapradāyikā // vajrabandhaṃ samādhāya samāgryā nāma madhyamā / buddhavidyottamasyeyaṃ mudrā buddhatvadāyikā // vajrabandhaṃ samādhāya madhyamā vajrasaṃyutā / vajravidyottamasyeyaṃ mudrā vajratvadāyikā // sā eva maṇimadhyā tu vajraratnapradāyikā / madhyakuḍmalayogena padmasiddhipradāyikā // vajrāñjaliṃ tu saṃdhāya lintu vajrakarmakarī bhavet / dharmavajraṃ samādhāya samayaḥ sidhyate kṣaṇāt // vajrabandhaṃ samāgraṃ tu buddhasiddhipradāyikā / ataḥ paraṃ pravakṣyāmi sattvamudrāṃ viśeṣataḥ // vajrāñjaliṃ samādhāya samadhyotthitā tathā / kaniṣṭhāṅguṣṭhavikacā viśvapadmeti kīrtitā // sā evāṅguṣṭhaparyaṅkā kuñcitāgrāgryavigrahā / madhyavajrajaṭāmūrdhani jaṭābandheti kīrtitā // vajrabandhaṃ dṛḍhīkṛtya samāṅguṣṭham adhargatam / tarjanī dvayasaṃkocā samutthānā samādhitaḥ // samāñjaliṃ samādhāya tarjanī vajrapīḍitā / vikasitāṅguṣṭhamukhayor mudrāmogheśvarasya tu // vajrabandhaṃ dṛḍhīkṛtya samuttānaṃ tu bandhayet / samāṅguṣṭhakṛtā padme padmabuddheti kīrtitā // aṅguṣṭhavajratāgrābhyām aṅkuśaṃ khaḍgam eva ca / antyadvayavikāsā ca madhyānāmāgrakuḍmalā // samāñjaliṃ samādhāya valitāṅguṣṭhakuñcitā / tarjanyā tarjanīṃ gṛhyākarṣanyet padmavāṇayā // samāñjaliṃ tathottānāṃ bandhayet sādhumudrayā / sādhukārās dātavyāḥ sādhupadmeti kīrtitā // samāñjaliṃ dṛḍhīkṛtya kuñcitāgryā mukhasthitā / kaniṣṭhābhyāṃ tu vikacā padmabhṛkuṭir ucyate // vajrabandhaṃ dṛḍhīkṛtya hṛdayaṃ tu prasārayet / padmasūryeti vikhyātā sarvāṅgulisumaṇḍalā // samāñjaliṃ dṛḍhīkṛtya tarjanīṣṭhaṃ maṇīkṛtā / padmaratnadhvajāgrī tu mūdhni bāhuprasāritā // vajrabandhaṃ śiromūrdhni prasāryāgramukhaiḥ saha / svamukhenāṭṭahāsena ekādaśamukhī bhavet // samādhipadmāṃ saṃdhāya samāṅguṣṭhasamutthitā / padmatārasya mudreyaṃ sarvasiddhipradāyikā // padmatārasya mudrā tu padmayogāgryabandhanāt / padmakhaḍgasya mudreyaṃ khaḍgākāranijanāt // kuḍmalāntyamahāpadmā stabdhāṅguṣṭhagadā tathā / kuñcitāgryamahāśaṃkhā vajrabandhena cakritā // vajrāñjalīṃ dṛḍhīkṛtya dakṣiṇ’ oṃkāraveṣṭitā / vāmāgryāṅguṣṭhajāpāt tu sarvāgravikacāmbujā // vajrāñjalīṃ samādhāya vāmadakṣiṇatas tathā / nṛtyan salīlavalitā mūrdhnisthā nṛtyapadminī // vajrāñjaliṃ dṛḍhīkṛtya sarvāgravikacā tathā / parivartya tu padmena hṛdi sthāpya dṛḍhaṃ karī // vajrāñjalīṃ dṛḍhīkṛtya guhyayakṣaprayogataḥ / prasāritāñjalipuṭā mukhasthā padmayakṣiṇī // vajramuṣṭiṃ dṛḍhīkṛtya kuñcayitvā tu madhyame / svāṅguṣṭhapṛṣṭhanihite padmamusṭir udāhṛtā // vajradhātuprayogeṇa vajrāñjalisamutthitā / sarvapūjāgryadevīnāṃ samayāgryas tu bandhayet // vajrabandhaṃ dṛḍhīkṛtya saṃdhayet tarnajīdvayam / saṃkocāt purataḥ saṃdhed hayagrīveti kīrtitā // padmāñjaliṃ samādhāya tarjanīgranthibandhanā / amoghapāśamudreyaṃ tarjanyaṅguṣṭhaśaṅkalā // padmāñjaliṃ samādhāya vajrāveśaprayogataḥ / aṅguṣṭhābhyāṃ tu saṃpīḍyo kaniṣṭhānāmikāntarāv iti //

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition DHARMA_CritEdSarvatathagatatattvasangraha


1611

STT:?_2_1611

atha padmakuladharmamudrājñānaṃ bhavati // hrī / grī / prī / hī / śrī / śī / dī / hiḥ / gī / dhī / krī / vī / vi / rī / ṣṭrī / aḥ // padmamuṣṭiṃ dvidhīkṛtya karmamudrāḥ sa sādhayed iti // sarvatathāgatadharmasamayān mahākalparājāt sakalajagadvinayamahāmaṇḍalavidhivistaraḥ samāptaḥ // atha bhagavān punar api sarvatathāgatadharmadhāraṇīsamayasaṃbhavamudrādhiṣṭhānapadmaṃ nāma samādhiṃ samāpadyemāṃ svavidyottamām abhāṣat // oṃ sarvatathāgatadharmasamaye hūṃ // atha vajrapāṇir mahābodhisattvaḥ imāṃ svakulasaṃbhavāṃ vidyottamām abhāṣāt // oṃ vajrasamaye hūṃ // atha vajragarbho bodhisattvo mahā sattva imāṃ svavidyottamām abhāṣat // oṃ maṇiratnasamaye hūṃ // atha vajranetro bodhisattva imāṃ svavidyottamām abhāṣat // oṃ padmasamaye hūṃ // atha vajraviśo bodhisattva imāṃ svavidyottamām abhāṣat // oṃ karmasamaye hūṃ //

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition DHARMA_CritEdSarvatathagatatattvasangraha


1618

STT:?_2_1618

atha bhagavān āryāvalokiteśvaro bodhisattva idaṃ svakulasamayamudrāmaṇḍalam abhāṣat // athātaḥ saṃpravakṣyāmi mudrāmaṇḍalam uttamam / vajradhātupratīkāśaṃ padmaguhyam iti smṛtam // mahāmaṇḍalayogena sūtrayet sarvamaṇḍalam / tasya madhye supadme vai vajradhātvīśvarīṃ likhet // tasya vai sarvapārśveṣu samayāgryo yathopari / dharmavajryādayo lekhyāḥ svavidyābhiḥ samanvitāḥ // tatrāsāṃ mudrā bhavanti // oṃ sarvatathāgatadharmeśvari hūṃ // oṃ dharmasamaye vajrapadmini hūṃ // oṃbuddhābhiṣekaratnasamaye hūṃ // oṃ tārāsamaye hūṃ // oṃ viśvamukhe hūṃ // vajravegena niṣkramya vi.varūpāgryamaṇḍalam / tatra madhye likhet padmaṃ padmais tu parivāritam // tasya pārśveṣu sarveṣu padmamudrāpratiṣṭhitāḥ / padmacihnāḥ samāliekhyāḥ svamudrāḥ sugatātmanām // tatrāsāṃ mudrā bhavanti //: hrīḥ oṃ padmatathāgata // oṃ samantabhadrapadmavajrāṅkuśakośadhāriṇi hūṃ // oṃ padmarati // oṃ padmatuṣṭi // vajravegena cākramya dvitīye maṇḍale tathā / buddhābhiṣekā samālekhyā jaṭāmadhye mahāmbujam // tasya pārśveṣu sarveṣu yathāvad anupūrvaśaḥ / padmacihna samopetāḥ samayāgryo niveśayet // tatrāsāṃ hṛdayāni bhavanti //: śrīḥ oṃ bhṛkuṭi taṭi vai taṭi padme hūṃ // oṃ padmajvāle // oṃ saumini padme hūṃ // oṃ padmahāsiny ekādaśavaktre diri diri iṭṭe vaṭṭe cale pracale kusumadhare ili praviśa siddhiṃ me prayaccha hūṃ // vajravegena cākramya tṛtīyaṃ maṇḍalam tathā / tatra madhye supadme tu padmamudrāṃ niveśayet // tathaiva sarvapārśveṣu yathāvad anupūrvaśaḥ / padmacihnasamopetāḥ padmasaṃsthās tu saṃlikhet // tatrāsāṃ mudrā bhavanti //: dhīḥ // oṃ tāre tut tāre hūṃ // oṃ dhī hūṃ // oṃ padmacakraśaṃkhagadādhāriṇi nīlakaṇṭhe sidhya sidhya hūṃ // oṃ paṇḍaravāsini padmasaṃbhave vada vada hūṃ // vajravegena cākramya caturthe maṇḍalottame / padmamadhye likhet padmaṃ jvālāmālākulaprabham // tasya pārśveṣu sarveṣu yathāvad anupūrvaśaḥ / padmacihnāḥ samālekhyāḥ padmamadhyapratiṣṭhitāḥ // tatrāsāṃ mudrā bhavanti //: strīḥ // oṃ padmanatreśvari pūjaya sarvātathāgatān naṭa naṭa hūṃ // oṃ abhyaye padmakavacabandhe rakṣa māṃ hūṃ haṃ // oṃ mahāpracaṇḍi padmayakṣiṇi viśvarūpadhāriṇi bhīṣāpaya sarvaduṣṭān khāda khāda hūṃ phaṭ // oṃ padmamuṣṭi aḥ aḥ // vajravegena cākramya buddhapūjāḥ samālikhet / padmāṅkuśyādayo mudrāḥ padmacihnāḥ samāsataḥ // iti // athāsāṃ mudrā bhavanti //: oṃ padmaratipūje hoḥ // oṃ padmābhiṣekapūje raṭ // oṃ padmagītapūje gīḥ // oṃ padmanṛtyapūje kṛt // oṃ dhūpapadmini hūṃ // oṃ padmapuṣpi hūṃ // oṃ padmakulasundari dharmāloke pūjaya hūṃ // oṃ padmagandhe hūṃ // pūjādevyaḥ // oṃ padmāṅkuśy ākarṣaya mahāpadmakulān hayagrīvasamaye hūṃ jaḥ // oṃ amoghapāśakrodhasamaye praviśa prav.eśaya sarvasamayāṃ hūṃ // oṃ padmaśaṅkale vaṃ // oṃ padmaghaṇṭādhāri śīghram āveśaya samayāṃ ṣaṇmukhi aḥ // atha mudrāmaṇḍala ākarṣaṇādividhivistaraṃ kṛtvā, padmaśiṣyān yathāvat praveśayet // evaṃ vaden: na tvayā kasya cid vaktavyaṃ yad atra guhyam / mā te narakapatanaṃ bhaved du.khāni cātra janmanīti // tataḥ samāveśyaivaṃ vadet /: tvatcakṣuṣpathi kīdṛśo ’vabhāsaḥ /

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition DHARMA_CritEdSarvatathagatatattvasangraha


1646

STT:?_?_1646

tad yathā vadati tathā siddhir iti / tad yadi śvetālokaṃ paśyet tasyottamasiddhijñānaṃ śikṣayet / atha pītaṃ paśyet tasyārthotpattijñānaṃ śikṣayet / atha raktaṃ paśyet tato ’nurāgaṇajñānaṃ śikṣayet / atha kṛṣṇaṃ paśyet tato ’bhicārukajñānaṃ śikṣayet / atha victraṃ paśyet mukhabandhaṃ muktvā,

Translation

1648

STT:?_?_1648

iti jñātvā, yathāvan mukhabandhaṃ muktvā, yathābhājanatayā jñānāny utpādayet / mudrājñānaṃ ca śikṣayet /

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition DHARMA_CritEdSarvatathagatatattvasangraha


1650

STT:?_?_1650

evaṃ vajradhātvādiṣv api sarvamaṇḍaleṣu yathābhājanatayā mudrājñānāni śikṣayed, iyaṃ parīkṣā // athottamasiddhiniṣpattijñānaṃ bhavati //: lokeśvaramahāsattvaṃ viśvarūpaṃ svam ātmānā / bhāvayaṃs tu mahāmudrām agryāṃ siddhim avāpnuyāt // buddhābhiṣekasamayāṃ dṛḍhīkṛtvā samāhitaḥ / bhāvayaṃs tu svam ātmānam agryāṃ siddhim avāpnute // padmapadmamahāsattvaṃ bhāvayet svayam ātmanā / ātmānam uttamāṃ siddhiṃ prāpnoti susamāhitaḥ // amogheśvaramayīṃ karmamudrāṃ svayaṃ bhuvaḥ / sādhaya vidhivac chīghram agryāṃ siddhim avāpnuyāt // iti // athaiṣāṃ hṛdayāni bhavanti //: oṃ padmasattvo ’haṃ sidhya hoḥ // oṃ buddhābhiṣeko ’haṃ sidhya māṃ // oṃ dharmasamādhir ahaṃ sidhya hoḥ // oṃ amogheśvaro ’haṃ sidhya māṃ // tato ’rthaniṣpattijñānaṃ bhavati //: hiraṇyaṃ tu mukhe viddhvā bhāvayet svayam ātmanā / viśveśvaramahāmudrām ekaṃ bhūyāt sahasraśaḥ // suvarṇatolakaṃ gṛhya samayāgryā mahādṛḍham / bhāvayan svayam ātmānam eko bhūyāt sahasraśaḥ // muktāphalaṃ mukhe viddhvā bhāvayet svayam ātmanā / lokeśvaraṃ svam ātmānam eko bhūyāt sahasraśaḥ // sarvaratnāni saṃgṛhya pāṇibhyāṃ karmamudrayā / bhāvayan svayam ātmānam eko bhūyāt sahasraśaḥ // iti // tatraiṣāṃ hṛdayāni bhavanti //: oṃ padmahiraṇyaprada huṃ jjaḥ // oṃ padmasuvarṇaprada huṃ jjaḥ // oṃ padmamuktāprada huṃ jjaḥ // oṃ padmasarvaratnaprada huṃ jjaḥ // athānurāgaṇajñānaṃ bhavati //: viśveśvaramahāmudrāṃ bhāvayan svayam ātmanā / padmaṃ gṛhya puraḥ sthāti yasya so ’syānurajyati // raktapadmaṃ dṛḍhaṃ gṛhya mahāsamayamudrayā / bhāvayan svayam ātmānaṃ rāgayet sarvayoṣitaḥ / bhāvayet svayam ātmānaṃ padmaṃ gṛhya yathā tathā / nirīkṣed vajradṛṣṭyā vai sarvalokaṃ sa rāgayet // karmamudrāprayogeṇa padmaṃ gṛhya yathāvidhi / karābhyāṃ bhrāmayaṃs taṃ tu rāgayet sarvayoṣitaḥ // iti // tatraiṣāṃ hṛdayāni bhavanti //: oṃ viśveśvaramahāpadma hoḥ // oṃ samayapadma hoḥ // oṃ yogapadma hoḥ // oṃ karmapadma hoḥ // athābhicārukajñānaṃ bhavati //: viśveśvaramahāmudrāṃ bhāvayan svayam ātmanā / chinded yasya puraḥ padmaṃ tasya mṛtyuḥ kṣaṇād bhavet // padmaṃ gṛhya dṛḍhaṃ samyak samayāgryā tayaiva hi / sphoṭayet taṃ tu sudṛḍhaṃ yasya nāmnā sa naśyati // samādhimudrāṃ saṃdhyāya padmaṃ gṛhya yathā tathā / yasya nāmnā tu padmaṃ vai chindet sa tu vinaśyati // karmamudrāprayogeṇa padmaṃ gṛhya yathāvidhi / sphoṭayed yasya saṃkruddhaḥ sphuṭet tasya tu jīvitam // iti // tatraiṣāṃ hṛdayāni bhavanti //: oṃ mahāpadmacheda māraya hoḥ phaṭ // oṃ mahāpadmasphoṭa nāśaya raṭ phaṭ // oṃ dharmapadmacheda vināśaya dhṛt phaṭ // oṃ karmapadmasphoṭa sphoṭaya jīvitam asya kṛt phaṭ // tato dharmasamayarahasyamudrājñānaṃ bhavati //: padmaṃ tu yoṣitāṃ cintya vajraṃ tasyopari svayam / rāmayan padmapadmāgryā samāpattyā tu sidhyati // padmaṃ tu yoṣitāṃ cintya buddhaṃ tasyopari svayam / rāmyam buddhamukuṭāṃ bhāvayan so ’sya sidhyati // padmaṃ tu yoṣitāṃ cintya padmaṃ tasyopari svayam / rāgayan padmapadmāgrīṃ śuddhāṃ siddhim avāpnute // padmaṃ tu yoṣitāṃ cintya viśvaṃ tasyopari svayam / rāmayan viśvapadmāgrīṃ viśvāṃ siddhim avāpnuyāt // iti // tatraiṣāṃ hḍayāni bhavanti //: oṃ vajrapadmasaṃyoga sādhaya hrīḥ // oṃ buddhamukuṭasaṃyoga sādhaya śrīḥ // oṃ padmapadmasaṃyoga sādhaya dhīḥ // oṃ viśvapadmasaṃyoga sādhaya strīḥ // tato yathāvat padmakulaguhyamahāmudrājñānaṃ bhavati //: kuḍmalāñjalir agrasya vajrakrodhāṅgulī dvike / dvyagrā maṇis tathā padmaṃ vajrabandhaṃ tathaiva ca // vajrabandhāṃ samānīya samamadhyāṅkurotthitā / tarjanyanāmasaṃkocā mudrā śakyamuner dṛḍhā // dharmavajrā hṛdisthā tu parivartya lalāṭagā / samādhiyogāc cotsaṅge parivartya tu mūrdhagā // vajradhātvīśvarīṃ baddhvā caityaṃ padmaprayogataḥ / saṃdhayen madhyamābhyāṃ tu buddhapadmeti kīrtitā // sā evāṅkuṣṭhavajrā tu dvyagrakhaḍgāṅkuśī tathā / padmavajradharasyaitā guhyamudrāḥ prakīrtitāḥ // sā evāṅguṣṭhamuktā tu tarjanyā tarjanī grahā / valitā suratiḥ proktā sādhukāryā tathaiva ca // vajrabandhaṃ dṛḍhīkṛtya samāṅguṣṭhapraveṣitā / kuñcitāgryamukhasthā tu bhṛkuṭyāṃ madhyapadminī // sā eva hṛdaye caiva sūryamaṇḍaladarśikā / dhvajabandhena sā eva śiraḥpṛṣṭhe prasāritā // vajrabandhaṃ dṛḍhīkṛtya kuñcitāgryāgravigrahā / tathaiva padmakhaḍgā tu padmayogāgryasaṃdhanāt // vajrabandhaṃ dṛḍhīkṛtya vāmāṅguṣṭhapraveśanāt / śaṃkham aṅguṣṭhadaṇḍotthā sarvāgrotthāntyapadminī // sā eva sarvasaṃkocā kaniṣṭhā padmasaṃyutā / akṣamālāgragaṇanī dakṣiṇāṅguṣṭhayogataḥ // vajrabandhaṃ dṛḍhīkṛtya kaniṣṭhā padmasaṃyutā / samāgrā padmanetrā tu pranartan parivartitā // vajrabandhaṃ dṛḍhīkṛtya kaniṣṭhāgra padmasaṃyutā / kuñictāgrā sugāḍhaṃ tu dvyaṅguṣṭhakavacīkṛtā // iti // sā evāṅguṣṭhadaṃṣṭrā tu samāṅguṣṭhapraveśitā / ataḥ paraṃ pravakṣyāmi samayāgryo niruttarāḥ // vajrabandhaṃ tale kṛtvā tarjanī padmasaṃsthitā / aṅguṣṭhā baddhaparyaṅkā guhyaviśveśvarī smṛtā // tathaiva vajrabandhena kaniṣṭhamadhyabandhitā / aṅguṣṭhamukhayor vajraṃ jaṭāmadhye tathāgatam // tathaiva vajrabandhe tu padmam aṅguṣṭhasaṃdhitam / kṛtvā tu mukhatodvāntaṃ sthitotsaṅge samādhinā // tathaiva vajrabandhe tu mukhataḥ samasaṃdhitā / sarvāṅgulyo dṛḍhīkṛtya tarjanī vajrasaṃyutā // tathaiva vajrabandhe tu tarjanī padmasaṃdhitā / aṅguṣṭhā baddhaparyaṅkā madhyasaṃkocavigrahā // tathaiva vajrabandhe tu vajram aṅguṣṭhasaṃdhitā / khaḍgāṅkuśī tathā grābhyāṃ kaniṣṭhā padmasaṃyutā // tathaiva valitāṃ kṛtvā tarjanyaṅguṣṭhasaṃgraham / utthitāṃ tarjanīṃ vāmāṃ karṣayet sudṛḍhaṃ tathā // sā eva tu samīkṛtya tarjanyaṅguṣṭhayogataḥ / sādhukārapradātrī tu padmatuṣṭer mahātmanaḥ // tathaiva vajrabandhaṃ tu sarvāgramukhasaṃdhitaṃ / dvyaṅguṣṭhamukhapīḍaṃ tu samāgryā saṃniveśitam // sā eva hṛdi sūryā tu mūrdhni padmadhvajīkṛtā / parivartya ca hāsā tu sthitā padmāṭṭahāsinī // vajrabandhaṃ tale kṛtvā dharmavajrāgrayogataḥ / kaniṣṭhāṅguṣṭhasaṃdhī tu tārāyāḥ samayo hy ayam // tathaiva vajrabandhe tu jyeṣṭhābhyāṃ khaḍgapadminī / talacakrā tathaiveha japadātrī tathaiveha japadātrī tathaiva ca // tathaiva vajrabandhā tu khaṭakadvayamokṣitā / punaś ca hṛdayabandhe guhyarakṣeti kīrtitā // tathaiva vajrabandhe tu kaniṣṭhā padmasaṃyutā / tarjanī dṛḍhasaṃkocā vikacāṅguṣṭhadaṃṣṭriṇī // sā eva muṣṭiyogena dvyaṅguṣṭhamukhapīḍitā / padmaguhyamahāmuṣṭisamayāgrī prakalpitā // sarvāsām eva cānyāsāṃ padmalāsyādisaṃjñitām / vajrabandhaṃ tale kṛtvā bandhas tādṛśa eva hi // iti // tataḥ padmakulaguhyadharmamudrā bhavanti //: hrāḥ// grā // prā // hā // śrā // śā // dāḥ // haḥ // gā // dhā // krā // vā // va // rā // ṣṭrā maḥ // karmamudrāḥ samāsena muṣṭir eva dvidhīkṛteti // //

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition DHARMA_CritEdSarvatathagatatattvasangraha


1708

STT:?_?_1708

sarvatathāgatadharmasamayān mahākalparājāt padmaguhyamaṇḍalavidhivistaraḥ parisamāptaḥ // // dharma-jñāna-maṇḍala-vidhi-vistara atha bhagavān punar api sarvatathāgatadharmajñānasamayasaṃbhavādhiṣṭhānapadaṃ nāma samādhiṃ samāpadyemaṃ svavidyottamam abhāṣat //:

1709

STT:?_?_1709

oṃ dharmasamādhijñānatathāgata hūṃ // atha vajrapāṇir mahābodhisattvaḥ imaṃ svakuladharmasaṃbhavaṃ svavidyottamam abhāṣat //: oṃ vajradharma hūṃ // atha vajragarbho bodhisattvo mahāsattva imaṃ svavidyottamam abhāṣat //: oṃ ratnadharma hūṃ // atha vajranetro bodhisattvo mahāsattva imaṃ svavidyottamam abhāṣat //: oṃ dharmadharma hūṃ // atha vajraviśvo bodhisattvo mahāsattva imaṃ svavidyottamam abhāṣat //: oṃ karmadharma hūṃ //

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition DHARMA_CritEdSarvatathagatatattvasangraha


1714

STT:?_?_1714

atha āryāvalokiteśvaro bodhisattvo mahāsattva idaṃ svadharmamaṇḍalam abhāṣat // athātaḥ saṃpravakṣyāmi jñānamaṇḍalam uttamam / vajradhātupratīkāśaṃ dharmajñānam iti smṛtam // mahāmaṇḍalayogena sūtrayet sarvamaṇḍalam / tasya madhye samālekhyaṃ jñānavajre tathāgatam // tasya pārśveṣu sarveṣu mahāsattvā yathāvidhi / viśveśvarādayo lekhyāḥ samāpannāḥ samāhitāḥ // iti // tatraiṣāṃ hṛdayāni bhavanti //: oṃ jñānabuddha hūṃ // oṃ jñānaviśveśvara hūṃ // oṃ jñānabuddhamukuṭa hūṃ // oṃ jñānadharmeśvara hūṃ // oṃ jñānāmogheśvara hūṃ // oṃ jñānapadmabuddha hūṃ // oṃ jñānapadmarāja hūṃ // oṃ jñānapadmamāra hūṃ // oṃ jñānapadmatuṣṭi hūṃ // oṃ jñnapadmabhṛkuṭi hūṃ // oṃ jñānapadmasūrya hūṃ // oṃ jñānapadmacandra hūṃ // oṃ jñānapadmahansa hūṃ // oṃ jñānapadmatāra hūṃ // oṃ jñānapadmakumāra hūṃ // oṃ jñānapadmanārāyaṇa hūṃ // oṃ jñānapadmabhāṣa hūṃ // oṃ jñānapadmanṛtyeśvara hūṃ // oṃ jñānapadmarakṣa hūṃ // oṃ jñānapadmayakṣa hūṃ // oṃ jñānapadmamuṣṭi hūṃ // oṃ jñānapadmalāsye hūṃ // oṃ jñānapadmamāle hūṃ // oṃ jñānapadmagīte hūṃ // oṃ jñānapadmanṛtye hūṃ // oṃ padmajñānadhūpe hūṃ // oṃ padmajñānapuṣpe hūṃ // oṃ padmajñānadīpe hūṃ // oṃ padmajñānagandhe hūṃ // oṃ padmajñānāṅkuśa hūṃ // oṃ padmajñānāmoghapāśa hūṃ // oṃ padmajñānasphoṭa hūṃ // oṃ padmajñānāveśa hūṃ // athātra padmadharamamaṇḍala ākarṣaṇādividhivistaraṃ kṛtvā, yathāvat praveśyaivaṃ vadet /: na tvayānyasya vaktavyam / mā te narakapatanaṃ bhavet / duḥkhāni vā

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition DHARMA_CritEdSarvatathagatatattvasangraha


1726

STT:?_?_1726

iti / tato ’sya jñānāny utpādayet //: lokeśvarasamāpattyā hṛdi padmaṃ tu bhāvayet / prāptapadmasamādhis tu śīghram utpatati kṣaṇāt // lokeśvarasamāpattyā lalāṭe padmabhāvanāt / abhyasan sudṛḍhībhūtāḥ khegāmī bhavate kṣaṇāt // jihvāyāṃ bhāvayan padmaṃ lokeśvarasamādhinā / saṃsiddho bhavate śīghram ākāśena sa gacchati // bhāvayan padmam uṣṇīṣe lokeśvarasamādhinā / saṃsiddho bhavate śīghram ūrdhvam utpatati kṣaṇāt // tatraiṣāṃ hṛdayāni bhavanti //: oṃ padmajñānahṛdayāviśa // oṃ padmajñānābhiṣekāviśa // oṃ padmajñānavidyottamāviśa // oṃ padmajñānoṣṇīṣāviśa // ākāśe vānyadeśe vā padmabimbaṃ tu bhāvayet / anena vidhinā siddho adṛśyo bhavati kṣaṇāt // ākāśe vānyadeśe vā padmabimbaṃ tu bhāvayet / tatrārūḍhaḥ svam ātmānaṃ bhāvayann adṛśyo bhavet // ākāśe vānyadeśe vā padmabimbaṃ tu bhāvayet / yadā paśyet tadā gṛhṇec chīgram adṛśyo bhavati // ākāśe vānyadeśe vā padmabimbaṃ tu bhāvayet / dṛṣṭvā tu bhuktvā tat padmam adreśyo bhavati kṣaṇāt // iti // tatraiṣāṃ hṛdayāni bhavanti //: oṃ padmākāśa // oṃ padmaratha // oṃ padmajñāna gṛhṇa // oṃ padmarasāyana // vicitravarṇasaṃsthānaṃ padmabimbaṃ tu pāṇinā / gṛhya baddhvā mahāmudrāṃ sarvarūpadharo bhavet // vicitravarṇasaṃsthānaṃ padmabimbaṃ tu lekhayet / tatra bhāvayamānas tu bahurūpadharo bhavet // vicitravarṇasaṃsthānaṃ padmabimbaṃ tu bhāvayet / ākāśe vānyadeśe vā chandarūpī bhaviṣyati // vicitravarṇasaṃsthānaṃ padmabimbaṃ ghaṭāpayet / tatrārūḍhas tu khegāmī kāmarūpī bhaved dhruvam // iti // tatraiṣāṃ hṛdayāni bhavanti //: oṃ padmadharaviśvarūpapravartakāviśa // oṃ viśvapadma pravartaya mām // oṃ samādhiviśvapadmāviśa // oṃ viśvapadmāsanotkṣipākāśaṃ, viśvarūpam adhitiṣṭha mām // baddhvā caikatarāṃ samyaṅ mahāmudrāṃ samādhitaḥ / padmaṃ gṛhya pradātavyaṃ vaśībhavati śāśvataḥ // baddhvā caikatarāṃ samyaṅ mudrāsamayasaṃjñitām / tayā gṛhya tu vai padmaṃ dadyād vaśyakaro bhavet // baddhvā caikatamāṃ mudrāṃ samādhivhitāṃ śubhām / jñānapadmaṃ daded yasya so ’sya śīghraṃ vaśībhavet // baddhvā caikatamāṃ mudrāṃ karmākhyāṃ samayānvitaḥ / yasya dadyāt samupaśaḥ sa nū vaśyaḥ? padmadānāt kṣaṇād bhavet // iti // tatraiṣāṃ hṛdayāni bhavanti //: oṃ mahāpadma hoḥ // oṃ samayapadma hoḥ // oṃ jñānapadma hoḥ // oṃ karmapadma hoḥ // tato jñānamaṇḍalamahāmudrājñānaṃ śikṣayet //: dharmamaṇḍalayogena mahāmudrās tu sādhayet / ataḥ paraṃ pravakṣyāmi samayāgryaḥ prasādhayet // dharmamaṇḍalayogena padmapadmaṃ tu saṃsthapet / dharmamuṣṭiṃ dṛḍhīkṛtya karmamudra dvidhīkṛtāḥ // iti //

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition DHARMA_CritEdSarvatathagatatattvasangraha

1756

STT:?_?_1756

athāryāvalokiteśvaro bodhisattvo mahāsattva idaṃ svakarmamaṇḍalam abhāṣat //: atāthaḥ saṃpravakṣyāmi karmamaṇḍalam uttamam / vajradhātupratīkāśaṃ padmakarmam iti smṛtam // mahāmaṇḍalayogena sūtrayet sarvamaṇḍalam / buddhasya sarvataḥ sarvāḥ padmacihnadharā likhet // iti // tatrāsāṃ vidyāhṛdayāni bhavanti //: oṃ padmabhūriṇi hūṃ // oṃ viśvakarmeśvari hūṃ // oṃ tathāgataiśvaryābhiṣekakarmavidye hūṃ // oṃ dharmakarmeśvari jñānapūjāsamaye hūṃ // oṃ amoghakarmeśvari hūṃ // oṃ padmakarmabuddhe hūṃ // oṃ padmakarmavajriṇi hūṃ // oṃ padmakāminīmāraṇapūjākarmasamaye hūṃ // oṃ padmakarmatuṣṭi hūṃ // oṃ padmakarmabhṛkuṭi hūṃ traḥ // oṃ padmakarmasūrye hūṃ // oṃ padmakarmadhvaje hūṃ // oṃ padmakarmahāse haḥ // oṃ padmakarmatāre hūṃ // oṃ padmakarmakumāri hūṃ // oṃ padmakarmanārāyaṇi hūṃ // oṃ padmakarmabrāhmi hūṃ // oṃ padmakarmanṛtyeśvari hūṃ // oṃ padmarakṣākarmasamaye hūṃ // oṃ padmarakṣarakṣākarmasamaye hūṃ //? oṃ mahāpracaṇḍi ghātani padmadaṃṣtrākarmakari hūṃ // oṃ padmakarmamuṣṭi ghātaya hūṃ // oṃ ratipūje hūṃ jaḥ // oṃ abhiṣekapūje hūṃ hoḥ // oṃ gītapūje hūṃ dhaḥ // oṃ nṛtyapūje hūṃ vaḥ // oṃ dhūpapūje hūṃ aḥ // oṃ puṣpapūje hūṃ traḥ // oṃ ālokapūje hūṃ dhiḥ // oṃ gandhapūje hūṃ vaṃ // oṃ hayagrīva ānaya hūṃ jaḥ // oṃ amoghapāśakrodhe pīḍaya hūṃ phaṭ // oṃ padmaśaṅkalabandhe hūṃ phaṭ // oṃ padmaghaṇṭa āveśaya hūṃ phaṭ // athātra karmamaṇḍala ākarṣaṇādividhivistaraṃ kṛtvā yathāvat praveśyaivaṃ vadet //: na tvayā, kulaputra, kasyacid ayaṃ vaktavyaḥ / mā te narakapatanaṃ bhavet /

iti // tato jñānāny utpādayed iti //

1769

STT:?_?_1769

tataḥ padmadeśanājñānaṃ ṣikṣed iti // lokeśvaramahāmudrāṃ bhāvayan susamāhitaḥ / pāpāni deśayañ chīghraṃ savapāpān sa śodhayet // samayāgrīṃ samādhāya lokeśvarasamādhinā / deśayan sarvapāpāni ānantaryāṇi śodhayet // lokeśvarasamādhiṃ tu bhāvayan susamāhitaḥ / deśayan sarvapāpāni sarvapāpapraṇāśanam // baddhvā caikatamāṃ samyak karmamudrāṃ samāsataḥ / deśayan sarvapāpāni sarvakarmaviśodhanam // iti // athaiṣāṃ hṛdayāni bhavanti // oṃ sarvapāpasaṃśodhanamahāpadma // oṃ sarvānantaryaśodhanasamayapadma // oṃ sarvapāpapraṇāśadharmapadma // oṃ sarvakarmāvaraṇaviśodhakakarmapadma // tataḥ sarvāvaraṇaparikṣayajñānaṃ śikṣayet // lokeśvaramahāmudrāṃ bhāvayet susamāhitaḥ / śudhya śudhya iti prodya sarvakarmāni śodhayet // baddhvā vai karmasamayāṃ lokeśvarasamādhinā / budhya budhya pravartaṃs tu sarvakarmāṇi śodhayet // lokeśvarasamāpattyā dharmamudrāṃ tu bhāvayet / dhī dhī dhīti procyan vai sarvakarmāṇi śodhayet // baddhvā vai karmamudrāṃ tu lokeśvarasamādhinā / hī hī hī hīti saṃdhāya sarvakarmāṇi śodhayet // iti // tatraiṣāṃ hṛdayāni bhavanti // oṃ pāpakṣayapadma // oṃ āvaraṇakṣayapadma // oṃ nīvaraṇakṣayapadma // oṃ karmakṣayapadma // tataḥ sarvatathāgatapūjājñānaṃ ṣikṣayet //: lokeśvaramahāmudrāṃ baddhvā tu susamāhitaḥ / oṃ oṃ oṃ oṃ iti brūyāt sarvapūjāṃ pravartanam // baddhvā vai samayāgrīṃ tu lokeśvarasamādhinā / bhū bhū bhū bhūr iti prokte sarvabuddhān sa pūjayet // lokeśvarasamāpattyā dharmapadmaṃ tu bhāvayet / he he he heti saṃdhāya sarvabuddhān sa pūjayet // padmakarmamayīṃ mudrāṃ baddhvā gāḍhaṃ samāhitaḥ / dhe dhe dhe dha iti procya sarvabuddhān sa pūjayet // iti // tatrāsāṃ hṛdayāni bhavanti //: oṃ oṃkārapadma // oṃ bhūkārapadma // oṃ hekāradharmapadma // oṃ dhekārakarmapadma // tataḥ siddhijñānaṃ śikṣayet //: lokeśvaramahāmudrāṃ baddhvā tu susamāhitaḥ / hrī hrī hrī hrīti varteta siddhir lokeśvarī bhavet // baddhvā vai samayāgrīṃ tu lokeśvarasamādhinā / śrī śrī śrī śrīti saṃdhāya prāpnuyāt siddhim uttamām // lokeśvarasamāpattiṃ bhāvayan susamāhitaḥ / dhig dhig dhig dhig iti prokte padmakrodhas tu sidhyati // karmamudrāṃ samādhāya mahāpadmamayīṃ śubhām / siḥ siḥ siḥ sīti saṃdhāya padmasiddhim avāpnute // iti // athāsāṃ hṛayāni bhavanti //: oṃ hrīḥ sidhya // oṃ śrīḥ sidhya // oṃ dhik sidhya // oṃ siḥ sidhya // tataḥ karmarahasyamudrājñānaṃ bhavati //: lokeśvarasamāpattyā ramayan sarvayoṣitaḥ / aho sukha iti prokte sarvabuddhān sa pūjayet // lokeśvarasamāpattyā ramayan sarvayoṣitaḥ / priye priyeti vai prokte buddhānāṃ bhavati priyaḥ // lokeśvarasampattyā ramayan sarvayoṣitaḥ / aho rateti vai prokte ratir bhavet sa śāśvatī // lokceśvarasamāpattyā ramayan sarvayoṣitaḥ / sukha sukha iti prokte sukhaṃ tasya na hīyate // athāsāṃ hṛdayāni bhavanti //: oṃ sarvabuddhapūjāpravartanapadma // oṃ prītikarapadma hoḥ // oṃ ratipravartanapadma ho // oṃ mahāsukhapadma dṛdha ho // tataḥ karmamahāmudrā yathāvac chikṣayet // tataḥ sukuḍmalāñjaliṃ samayamudrāvajrakāryam / karmamaṇḍalayogena sarvasthāneṣu sthāpayet // yataḥ padmakuladharmamudrātrakārayoktavyā / karmasamayāṃ dvidhīkṛtya karmamudrāḥ sa sādhayet // iti //

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition DHARMA_CritEdSarvatathagatatattvasangraha

1803

STT:?_?_1803

athāryāvalokteśvaro bodhisattvo mahāsattva idaṃ caturmudrāmaṇḍalam abhāṣat //: āthātaḥ saṃpravakṣyāmi caturmudrāgramaṇḍalam / vajradhātupratīkāśaṃ mahāmaṇḍalasaṃnibham // mudrāmaṇḍalamadhye tu buddhabimbaṃ niveśayet / tasya pārśveṣu sarveṣu vajrapadmādayo likeht // athātra mahāmaṇḍala ākarṣaṇādividhivistaraṃ kṛtvā, yathāvat praveśya brūyāt /: na tvayedaṃ kasya cid vaktavyaṃ mā te mahāduḥkha.ṃ bhaved akālamaraṇaṃ viṣamakriyayā

1806

STT:?_?_1806

iti // tato jñānāny utpādayet //: padmaṃ hastena vai gṛhya samājighran prayatnataḥ / tena gandhena saṃyojya buddhān āśu prasidhyati // buddhabimbaṃ jaṭāmadhye pratiṣṭhāpya samāhitaḥ / sarvalokaṃ vaśaṃkuryād darśayan garvayā vajran // padmapadmamahābimbaṃ kārayitvā samādhinā / upaviśya yathātmānaṃ manasā sa tu mārayet // caturmukhaṃ tu vai padmaṃ kārayitvā kareṇa tu / saṃgṛhyāveśanādīni bhrāmayan prakaroti saḥ //

1811

STT:?_?_1811

athāiṣāṃ hṛdayāni bhavanti //: oṃ gandhapūjāgrya sādhaya hrīḥ // oṃ padmamukuṭatathāgata vaśīkuru sarvān lokeśvarābhiṣekasamaya hoḥ // oṃ padmapadma māraya sarvapratyarthikān, samādhijñāna dhik // oṃ viśvapadma sarvakarmakaro bhava lalilvali lali hūṃ phaṭ // tato mudrārahasyajñānaṃ śikṣayet //: raktaḥ san sarvakāryāṇi sādhayet samayo hy ayam / duḥsādhyā ’pi hi mudrā vai kṣaṇāt sidhyati yogata iti // tatrāsya samayo bhavati //:

1816

tato mahāmudrādisarvamudrābandhaṃ śikṣayet //:

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition DHARMA_CritEdSarvatathagatatattvasangraha


1817

STT:?_?_1817

caturmudrāmaṇḍalavidhivistaraḥ samāptaḥ (Tib.) athāryāvalokiteśvaro mahābodhisattva idaṃ sarvajagadvinayaṃ nāma hṛdayam abhāṣat //: oṃ sarvajagadvinayamahāsattvāgaccha, śīghraṃ vaiśvarūpyaṃ saṃdarśaya, mama ca sarvasiddhayaḥ prayaccha hrīḥ //

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition DHARMA_CritEdSarvatathagatatattvasangraha


1819

STT:?_?_1819

athāryāvalokiteśvaro mahābodhisattva idaṃ sarvajagadvinayaṃ nāma maṇḍalam abhāṣat //: athātaḥ saṃpravakṣyāmi jagadvinayamaṇḍalam / mahāmaṇḍalayogena saṃlikhed bāhyamaṇḍalam // tasyābhyantarataḥ padmaṃ tathaiva ca samālikhet / tatra sarvābjavisphātiviśvarūpaṃ samālikhet // iti // athātra mahāmaṇḍale yathāvad vidhivistareṇa praveśya, tathaivoktvā,

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition DHARMA_CritEdSarvatathagatatattvasangraha


1823

STT:?_?_1823

sarvajagadvinayajñānaṃ śikṣayet //: maṇḍalaṃ tu samālikhya jagadvinayasaṃjñitam / bhāvayaṃs tu mahāmudrāṃ bhaved viśvadharopamaḥ // iti // tato jagadvinayarahasyamudrājñānaṃ śikṣayet //: viśvarūpasamādhiṃ tu bhāvayan susamāhitaḥ / dvayendriyasamāpattyā maṇḍale tu sa sidhyati // tato mahāmudrādimudrābandhaṃ śikṣayet, tathaiva siddhayaḥ // evaṃ paṭādiṣv iti // mudrāyām apy ekamudrāmaṇḍalayogena tathaiva siddhaya iti // //

1827

STT:?_?_1827

1830

STT:?_?_1830

sarvatathāgatatattvasaṃgrahāt sarvatathāgatadharmasamayo nāma mahākalparājaḥ parisamāptaḥ // //

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition DHARMA_CritEdSarvatathagatatattvasangraha


1831

STT:?_?_1831

sarvatathāgatakarmasamayo nāma mahākalparājaḥ sarvārthasiddhimahāmaṇḍalavidhivistara atha khalu sarvatathāgatāḥ punaḥ samājam āgamya, sarvatathāgatābhiṣekaratnaṃ tam eva vajradharam āryākāśagarbhaṃ mahābodhisattvam anena nāmāṣṭaśatenādhyeṣitavantaḥ //: ākāśagarbha sattvārtha mahāsattva mahādyute / mahāratna suratnāgrya vajraratna namo ’stu te // abhiṣeka mahāratna mahāśuddha mahāśubha / buddharatna viśuddhāṅga ratnaratna namo ’stu te // ākāśākāśasaṃbhūta sarvākāśamahānabha / ākāśadhātu sarvāśa sarvāśāgrya namo ’stu te // ratnasaṃbhava ratnorṇa buddhorṇa sutathāgata / sarvaratna susarvāgrya ratnakārya namo ’stu te // ratna ratnāgrya ratnogra(?) ratna sarvatathāgata / ratnottama mahākāśa samākāśa namo ’stu te // alaṃkāra mahāśobha śobhākara suśobhaka / śuddha sarvārtha śuddhārtha dānacarya namo ’stu te // dharmaratna viḍuddhāgrya saṃgharatna tathāgata / mahābhiṣeka lokārtha pramodārtha namo ’sut te // dāna pradāna dānāgrya tyāga tyāgārya dāyaka / sarvasattvārtha tattvārtha mahārtha namo ’stu te // cintārāja mahāteja dānapāramitānaya / tathāgata mahāsattva sarvabuddha namo ’stu te // tathāgatamahāratna tathāgatamahāprabha / tathāgatamahāketo mahāhāsa namo ’stu te // tathāgatābhiṣekāgrya mahābhiṣeka mahāvibho / lokanātha sulokāgrya lokasūrya namo ’stu te // ratnādhikādhikatara ratnabhūṣaṇa ratnadhṛk / ratnāloka mahāloka ratnāloka namo ’stu te // ratnotkara suratnottha maṇe vajramaṇe guṇa / ratnākara sudīptāṅga sarvaratna namo ’stu te // mahātma yaṣṭi ratneśa sarvāśāparipūraka / sarvābhiprāyasaṃprāpti ratnaraśī namo ’stu te // ābhāgrya vyāpi sarvātma varaprada mahāvara / vibhūte sarvasaṃpatte vajragarbha namo ’stu te // yaḥ kaścid dhārayen nāmnām idaṃ te ’ṣṭaśataṃ śivam / sarvabuddhābhiṣekaṃ tu sa prāpnoty anaghaḥ kṣaṇāt // adhyeṣayāmas tvāṃ ratnaṃ bhāṣasva dhanasaṃcayam / sarvabuddhābhiṣekāgryam utpādaya nijaṃ kulam // iti // athākāśagarbho bodhisattva idaṃ sarvatathāgatavacanam upaśrutya, sarvatathāgatābhiṣekasamayaṃ nāma svahṛdayam abhāṣat //:

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition DHARMA_CritEdSarvatathagatatattvasangraha

1859

STT:?_?_1859

atha tata ākāśagarbhahṛdayāt sa eva bhagavān vajrapāṇi samantaraśmijvālāgarbhā vicitravajramaṇiratnābhiṣekādyābharaṇālamkārālaṃkṛtakāyā mahāvajramaṇiratnacihnamudrāvyagrakarā mahābodhisattvakāyā bhūtvā viniḥsṛtya,

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition DHARMA_CritEdSarvatathagatatattvasangraha


1860

STT:?_?_1860

sarvalokadhātuṣu mahāratnavarṣādibhī ratnotpattibhiḥ saṃtoṣya punar āgatya, bhagavato vairocanasya sarvato vajradhātumahāmaṇḍalayogena candramaṇḍalāśritā bhūtvedam udānam udānayiṃsuḥ // aho hi sarvabuddhānāṃ sarvaratnasamuccayam / vajraratnakulaṃ tv edaṃ saṃbhūtaṃ jagadarthataḥ // iti // athākāśagarbho bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ svakulam utpādya, sarvatathāgatebhyaḥ sarvāśāparipūryai niryātyedaṃ sarvārthasiddhiṃ nāma mahāmaṇḍalam abhāṣat //: athātaḥ saṃpuravakṣyāmi mahāmaṇḍalam uttamam / vajradhātupratīkāśaṃ sarvasiddhir iti smṛtam // caturasraṃ caturdvāraṃ catustoraṇaśobhitam / catuḥsūtrasamāyuktaṃ paṭṭasragdāmabhūṣitam // sarvamaṇḍalakoṇeṣu dvāraniryūhasaṃdhiṣu / khacitaṃ vajraratnais tu sūtrayed bāhyamaṇḍalam // tasyābhyantarataḥ kāryaṃ vajraratnasamaṃ puram / aṣṭasatambhāgrayogena sūtraṇaṃ tatra kārayet // pañcamaṇḍalaśobhaṃ tu nānāratnakarojjvalam / svamudrāparivāraṃ tu tatra buddhaṃ niveśayet // tatraiṣāṃ hṛdayāni bhavanti //: oṃ buddharatna hūṃ // oṃvajramaṇi hūṃ // oṃ vajraratāṅkura hūṃ // oṃ vajraratnapadma hūṃ // oṃ vajraratnavarṣa hūṃ // vajravegena cākramya sarvāśāsiddhimaṇḍalam / tatrasthaṃ vajragarbhaṃ tu likhed ratnavarapradam // tasya pārśveṣu sarveṣu ratnamudrāsamanvitāḥ / mahāsattvāḥ samālekhyā yathāvad anupūrvaśaḥ // athaiṣāṃ hṛdayāni bhavanti //: oṃ sarvārthasiddhiprada hūṃ // oṃ vajramaṇicihnākāśagarbha bhagavan sidhya sidhya hūṃ // oṃ ratnāṅkuśākarṣaya sarvārthān ānaya śīghraṃ sarvatathāgatasatyam anusmara hūṃ // oṃ maṇirāga vaśīkuru sarvārthān ānayākāśagarbha hūṃ // oṃ ratnatuṣṭi hūṃ // vajravegena cākramya ratnamālasya maṇḍalam / tatra madhye likhet samyag ratnamālādharaṃ param // tasya pārśveṣu sarveṣu yathāvad anupūrvaśaḥ / mahāsattvāḥ samālekhyā maṇicihnāgrapāṇayaḥ // tatraiṣāṃ hṛdayāni bhavanti //: oṃ ratnadṛṣṭi traḥ // oṃ sarvatathāgatābhiṣekaratnamāla hūṃ // oṃ maṇisūrya hūṃ // oṃ cintāmaṇidhvajasarvāśāprapūrakākāśagarbha hūṃ // oṃ ratnāṭṭahāsa hasa hasa hūṃ // vajravegena cākramya ratnapadmasya maṇḍalam / ratnasthaṃ tu samālekhyaṃ ratnapadmadharaṃ vibhum // tasya pārśveṣu sarveṣu mahāsattvān samālikhet / maṇicihnaṃ samāsena yathāvad anupūrvaśaḥ // tatraiṣāṃ hṛdayāni bhavanti //: oṃ ratnapadma hūṃ // oṃ tyāgasamādhijñānagarbha hūṃ // oṃ ratnakośāgrya hūṃ // oṃ maṇicakra pravartaya hūṃ // oṃ ratnabhāṣa hūṃ // vajravegena cākramya ratnavṛṣṭes tu maṇḍalam / tatra lekhyaṃ mahāsattvaṃ ratnavṛṣṭipravarṣayan // tasya pārśveṣu sarveṣu mahāsattvān yathāvidhi / ratnacihnasamopetān mudrāhastān samāsataḥ // tatraiṣāṃ hṛdayāni bhavanti //: oṃ ratnavṛṣṭi pravarṣaya sarvārthasaṃpado bhagavan maṇihasta hūṃ // oṃ maṇipūjāsamaya hūṃ // oṃ maṇibandhakavaca hūṃ // oṃ maṇidaṃṣṭrākarālamahāyakṣa hara hara sarvārthān bhīṣāpaya hūṃ // oṃ maṇiratnabandhasamaya hūṃ // vajravegena cākramya koṇabhāgeṣu sarvataḥ / ratnalāsyādayo lekhyā yathāvad anupurvaśaḥ // tatraiṣāṃ mudrā bhavanti //: oṃ ratnarati hūṃ // oṃ ratnamāle hūṃ // oṃ ratnagīte hūṃ // oṃ ratnanṛtye hūṃ // vajravegena niṣkramya bāhyamaṇḍalam uttamam / bāhyamaṇḍalakoṇeṣu dhūpapūjādayo likhet // tatraiṣāṃ mudrā bhavanti //: oṃ dhūparatne // oṃ puṣpamaṇi // oṃ ratnāloke // oṃ maṇigandhe // dvārapālās tu kartavyā dvāramadhyacatuṣṭaye / ataḥ paraṃ pravakṣyāmi maṇḍalavidhivistaram // athātra hṛdayāni bhavanti // oṃ sarvaratākarṣa āryāruṇamahāsattva bhagavantam ākāśagarbhaṃ codayākarṣaya śīghraṃ ho jaḥ // oṃ sarvaratnapraveśasamaya praveṣaya samayān mahāmaṇirājakulaṃ ratnapāśa hūṃ // oṃ maṇibandha hūṃ vaḥ // oṃ maṇiratāveśa aḥ // athātra mahāmaṇḍale svayaṃ maṇiratnācāryo yathāvat praviśya vidhivistaram ātmanaḥ kṛtvā, tato ratnādhiṣṭhitakalaśodakena maṇiśiṣyān abhiṣicya, vajramaṇisamayamudrāṃ bandhayed anena hṛdayena //:

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition DHARMA_CritEdSarvatathagatatattvasangraha

1895

tato bhagavān ākāśagarbho bodhisattvaḥ sarvaṃ jalpāpayatīty uktamātre mukhabandhaṃ muktvā, mahāmaṇḍalaṃ darśayet // sarvatathāgatābhṣekasamayaṃ codāharet // yāvad bhagavāṃs tathāgata āgata iti //

1897

STT:?_?_1897

tato yathāvibhavataḥ pūjāṃ kṛtvā sarvakāryāṇi sādhayed iti // athātra jñānamudrā bhavanti //: vajragarbhamahāmudrāṃ baddhvā tu susamāhitaḥ / nidhānaṃ khanate yatra nidhānaṃ tatra paśyati // baddhvā tu samayāgrīṃ vai nidhānaṃ yatra vidyate / pīḍayet tatra tāṃ mudrāṃ svayam uttiṣṭhate tadā // vajragarbhasamādhiṃ tu bhāvayan susamāhitaḥ / manasā caiva jānāti nidhānaṃ yatra tiṣṭhati // baddhvā karmamayīṃ mudrāṃ vajragarbhasamādhinā / tāṃ mudrām āviśed yatra nidhānaṃ tatra lakṣayet // tatraiṣāṃ hṛdayāni bhavanti //: oṃ mahāmaṇiratnāviśa hūṃ // oṃ maṇipīḍa darśaya // oṃ ratnasamādhi brūhi // oṃ ratnāveśa darśaya // mahāmudrāṃ samādhāya yatra kāyaṃ tu veṣṭayet / tatra ratnanidhānaṃ tu jñātavyaṃ samayāttmabhiḥ // baddhvā tu samayāgrīṃ vai yatrāviśya parisphuṭet / nidhānaṃ tatra vijñeyaṃ mahāratnamayaṃ bhavet // samādhimudrāṃ baddhvā vai yady āviśya svayaṃ punarḥ / brūyād yatra nidhānaṃ tu mahāratnamayaṃ bhavet // karmamudrāṃ tu baddhvā vai yadāviśya parasparam / hastau bandhe tu samayāṃ nidhiṃ tatra vinirdiśet // iti // tatraiṣāṃ hṛdayāni bhavanti //: oṃ mahāratnakāya darśaya ratnam // oṃ ākāśagarbha maṇiratna sphuṭa sphuṭa yatra nidhiḥ // oṃ maṇiratnajñāna svayaṃ brūhi // oṃ punaḥ samayabandha darśayasva // baddhvā tu vai mahāmudrāṃ yatrāśaṅkā bhavet tadā / tatra jñānena viñeyaṃ nidhānaṃ ratansaṃbhavam // yatra śaṅkā bhavet tatra samayāgrīṃ tu bandhayet / yadā mokṣaṃ svayaṃ yāyān nidhiṃ tatra vinirdiśet // samādhimudrāṃ baddhvā vai śaṅkā yatra bhaved dhruvā / jñānam upādya vijñeyaṃ nidhis tatrāsti śāśvataḥ // yatra bhūyo bhavec chaṅkā karmamudrāṃ tu tatra vai / badhnīyād vidhivat tāṃ tu sphuṭej jñeyo nidhiḥ punaḥ // tatraiṣāṃ hṛdayāni bhavanti //: oṃ nidhijñānāviśa // oṃ ratnasamaya muñca nidhibandhān // oṃ dharmaratna brūhi nidhānam // oṃ sarvakarmāṇi sphoṭaya darśaya nidhibandhotkṣipa // mahāmudrāṃ tu saṃdhāya nidhānaṃ parimārgayet / yatrasthasya samāveśo bhavet tatra vinirdiśet // baddhvā tu samayāgrīṃ vai nidhiṃ tu parimārgayet / yatrastho dṛḍhatāṃ yāyān nidhiṃ tatra vinirdiśet // samādhimudrāṃ saṃdhāya nidhānaṃ parimārgayet / yatrastho jñānavān bhūyān nidhiṃ tatra vinirdiśet // baddhvā karma mayīṃ mudrāṃ nidhiṃ tu parimārgayet / yatrasthaḥ karmamudrāṃ tu bhrāmayet tatra nirdiśet // tatraiṣāṃ hṛdayāni bhavanti //: oṃ mahāratnaparīkṣāviśa // oṃ ratnasamayadṛḍha darśaya // oṃ ratnaparīkṣājñānāviśa // oṃ maṇikarma bhrāmaya // tato maṇirahasyamudrājñānaṃ śikṣayet //: dvayendriyasamāpattyā nidhānaṃ parimārgayet / bhāvayaṃs tu mahāmudrāṃ samāveśān nidhiṃ labhet // baddhvā tu samayāgrīṃ vai rāmayaṃs tu striyaṃ tathā / yatra mudrā dṛḍhībhūyām nidhiṃ tatra vinirdiśet // dvayendriyasamāpattyā nidhānaṃ parimārgayet / bhāvayañ jñānamudrāṃ tu nidhijñānaṃ pravartate // baddhvā tu karmamudrāṃ vai dvayendriaysamādhitaḥ / sphuṭed yatra tu sā mudrā nidhiṃ tatra vinirdiśet // tatraiṣāṃ hṛdayāni bhavanti //: oṃ mahāmaṇisaṃyogāviśa // oṃ samayasaṃyoga dṛḍho me bhava // oṃ nidhijñānāviśāviśa saṃyoga // oṃ sarvakarmasphoṭasaṃyoga // tato mahāmaṇikulasarvamudrājñānaṃ śikṣayet //:

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition DHARMA_CritEdSarvatathagatatattvasangraha


1923

STT:?_?_1923

atha mahāmudrā bhavanti //: candramaṇḍalamadhyastho yathālekhyānusārataḥ / bhāvayaṃs tu mahāmudrāḥ sarvārthottamasiddhayaḥ // tato mahāmudrāṇāṃ karmā.i bhavanti /: buddhamudrā tu bhddhaṃtvaṃ susiddhir vajragarbhayoḥ / ratnāṅkuśā samākarṣā maṇirāgānurāgā // maṇituṣṭayā tu saṃtoṣā maṇidṛṣṭyārthakārikā / maṇimālābhiṣekā tu maṇisūryā sutejadā // cintāmaṇir yathecchādā ratnahāsārthahārikā / dharmaratnāpi dharmāptis tyāgāgrī lābham uttamam // ratnakośā mahākośaṃ maṇicakrādhipatyatām / bhāṣā mārgaṇasiddhis tu ratnavṛṣṭir mahādhanam // maṇipūjā supūjyaś ca ratnavārmā dṛḍhaṃkarī / ratnadaṃṣṭrā hared arthān maṇimuṣṭyā tu sidhyati // athātra mahāmaṇḍale samayamudrājñānaṃ bhavati //: vajraratnamayīmudrā sarvabuddhābhiṣekadā / mahāvajramaṇiṃ baddhvā vajraratnaṃ tu sidhyati // vajradvikaṃ maṇīkṛtvā dhanaṃ vajradharāl labhet / sā evāṅguṣṭhavajreṇa maṇiṃ dadyād dhṛdi sthitam // kuḍmalāgryā maṇiṃ baddhvā lokeśo dhanado bhavet / vajrakarmamaṇir dadyān mahāviśvamaṇidhvajam // vajradhātvagramaṇinā buddharatnatvam āpnuyāt / samāgrāpṛṣṭhasaṃkocā vajram aṅguṣṭhabandhataḥ // iyaṃ vajramaṇiḥ proktā vajragarbhasya pāṇitaḥ / anayā baddhamātrayā mahāvajramaṇiṃ labhet // ratnavajraṃ samādhāya samamadhyotthitāṅkurām / anayā baddhamātrayā svabhiṣekāny avāpnuyāt // sa eva madhyamānāmakaniṣṭhā kuḍmalīkṛtā / anayā tu dhanaṃ dadyād avaloktanāmadhṛk // vajraratnaprayogena tarjanyaṅguṣṭhakanyasā / madhyamābhyāṃ nakhasaṃdhānā samānāmāṅkurotthitā // vajrabandhaṃ dṛḍhīkṛtya tarjanībhyāṃ maṇīkṛtā / prasāritaṅguṣṭhamukhā hṛdi sarvārthasiddhidā // vajrabandhaṃ samādhāya madhyamāmaṇiyojitā / mudreyaṃ maṇicihnasya maṇiratnapradāyikā // sā evāṅkuśayogena tarjanībhyāṃ samanvitā / sarvārthakārṣaṇī mudrā maṇiratnāṅkuśī smṛtā // sā eva valitā caiva tarjanyā tarjanīgrahā / vāṇākarṣaṇayogena karṣayan rāgayej jagat // sā eva sādhukārā tu tarjanyaṅguṣṭhayojitā / sā evāṅguṣṭhasaṃdhānasaṃchannāgryāṅgulī tathā // aṅguṣṭhāntarayoś caiva punar agryā mukhekṣaṇāt / maṇidṛṣṭis tu sā khyātā dṛṣṭvārthānāṃ prahārikā //

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition DHARMA_CritEdSarvatathagatatattvasangraha


1944

STT:?_?_1944

sarvārthasiddhimālā tu svabhiṣekapradāyikā // sā eva hṛdaye ’ṅguṣṭhamukhasaṃdhānayojitā / hṛdaye maṇisūryā tu mahātejaḥpradāyikā // mūrdhnisthā ca samānāmapatākāgravidāritā / mahāvajramaṇiḥ pūrvaṃ sarvāśāparipūrikā // sā eva hāsasaṃsthā tu līlayā parivatitā / ratnāṭṭahāsā nāmnā vai hāsāt sarvārthakārikā // sarvāgramaṇipadmā tu dhanahārī samādhinā / sā evāntyādidānā tu mahādānapradāyikā // adhargatasamāṅguṣṭhatarjanīmaṇisaṃsthitā / maṇikośā hared arthān jagatāṃ vikrameṇa tu // vajrabandhāgracakrā tu samāṅguṣṭhapraveśitā / tarjanīmaṇisaṃsthānāc cakravartitvadāyikā // sā evāñjaliyogena mukhataś ca samuddhṛtā / sa tu saṃdhāya vācā vai svājñayā harate dhanam // mahāvajramaṇiṃ baddhvā ratnavarṣaṃ pravarṣate / sarvāṅgulyupastambhā tu catuḥśo varṣate dhanam // mahāvajramaṇiṃ baddhvā nṛtyann uṣṇīṣamadhyataḥ / saṃpūjya vidhivat sarve sarvaratnaiḥ prapūjyate // sarvārthasiddhimudrāṃ tu kaṇṇthādeśe pariṣvajet / maṇibandheti vikhyātā rakṣākavacinī smṛtā // sā eva sarvasiddhyarthā yakṣayogā mukhasthitā / maṇidaṃṣṭreti vikhyātā bhayāt sarvārthahāriṇī // vajrabandhaṃ dṛḍhīkṛtya kuñcitāgryā suyantritā / saṃgṛhyāṅguṣṭhayoḥ samyaṅ maṇimuṣṭis tu siddhidā // pūjāgrasamayānāṃ tu vajradhātuprayogataḥ / yathāvan maṇiyogena samayāgryo ’tra kalpitāḥ // madhyamāmaṇiyogena tā eva tu vikalpitāḥ / ekāṅkuśyādiyogena sarvakarmaprasādhikāḥ // iti atha mahāmaṇikuladharmamudrājñānaṃ bhavati //: traḥ / graḥ / triḥ / hrīḥ / śriḥ / iḥ / raḥ / haḥ / dhrīḥ / dhiḥ / kṛ / vā / rī / ḍhaḥ / ya / aḥ //

Translation
