1967

STT:?_?_1967

atha bhagavān āryākāśagarbho bodhisattvo mahāsattva idaṃ svakulasamayamudrāmaṇḍalam abhāṣat //: athātaḥ saṃpravakṣkyāmi mudrāmaṇḍalam uttamam / vajradhātupratīkāśaṃ ratnaguhyam iti smṛtam // mahāmaṇḍalayogena sūtrayet sarvamaṇḍalam / tasya madhye yathānyāyaṃ buddhamudrāṃ samālikhet // paryaṅkasthaṃ maṇiṃ pūrvaṃ vajradhātoḥ puro likhet / maṇimālāṃ maṇiṃ padme maṇiṃ maṇiparivṛtam // tatrāsāṃ mudrā bhavanti //: oṃ trāḥ // oṃ maṇisamaye hūṃ // oṃ maṇiratnābhiṣekamāle hūṃ // oṃ maṇiratnapadmi hūṃ // oṃ maṇiratnavṛṣṭisamaye hūṃ // vajravegena niṣkramya sarvasiddhes tu maṇḍale / vajraratnasya madhye tu mahāratnamaṇiṃ likhet // tasya pārśveṣu sarveṣu svamudrāmaṇisaṃyutā / yathāvad anupūrveṇa ratnācāryaḥ samālikhet // tatrāsāṃ mudrā bhavanti //: oṃ sarvārthasiddhiprade mahāvajraratnasamayamaṇi sarvārthān me sādhaya dhāraṇi hūṃ // oṃ maṇiratnākarṣe hūṃ // oṃ maṇiratnasamayāṅkuśy ākarṣaya maṇikulaṃ jaḥ // oṃ maṇirāgasamaye hūṃ // oṃ maṇisādhvi hūṃ // vajravegena cākramya dvitīyamaṇḍalaṃ tathā / tatra madhye maṇiṃ lekhyaṃ netradvikasamanvitam // tasyās tu sarvapārśveṣu yathāvad anupūrvaśaḥ / maṇicihnasamopetāḥ svamudrās tu samālikhet // tatrāsāṃ mudrā bhavanti //: oṃ vajramaṇiratnanetrānaya vaśīkuru sarvārthasaṃpadaḥ śīghraṃ dṛṣṭyaṅkuśi hūṃ // oṃ vajraratnamāle ’bhiṣiñca hūṃ // oṃ maṇiratnasūrye jvālaya sarvaṃ mahātejini hūṃ // oṃ maṇicandradhvajāgri hūṃ // oṃ maṇihāse hasa hūṃ // vajravegena cākramya tṛtīyaṃ maṇḍalaṃ tathā / tatra madhye samālekhyaṃ maṇipadmasamanvitam // tasya pārśveṣu sarveṣu yathāvad anupūrvaśaḥ / maṇicihnasamopetāḥ svamudrās tu samālikhet // vajravegena cākramya maṇipadmaṃ samālikhet / tasya pārśveṣu sarveṣu yathāvad anupūrvaśaḥ // tatrāsāṃ mudrā bhavanti //: oṃ maṇisamādhipadmini hūṃ // oṃ maṇiratnatyāgasamaye hūṃ // oṃ maṇisamayakośe hūṃ // oṃ maṇisamayacakre hūṃ // oṃ maṇibhāṣāgri hūṃ // vajravegeṇa cākramya caturthaṃ maṇḍalottamam / tatrasthaṃ ratnavṛṣṭyā tu vajraṃ ratnasamanvitam // saṃlikheta yathāvat tu karmamudrāparivṛtam / maṇicihnaprayogais tu yathāvad anupūrvaśaḥ // athāsāṃ mudrā bhavanti //: oṃ ratnavṛṣṭi sādhaya mahāmaṇi hūṃ // oṃ mahāpūjāsamaye nṛtya nṛtya aḥ // oṃ maṇiratnasamayarakṣe // oṃ vajramaṇiratnadaṃṣṭrākarāle hara hara hūṃ // oṃ maṇisamayamuṣṭi // athātra maṇiguhyamaṇḍale yathāvat karma kṛtvā, śiṣyān praveśya brūyāt //: na tvayā kasyacid ayaṃ nayo vaktavyaḥ, mā te mahādāridryamahākālakriyānarakapatanaṃ syāt.

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition DHARMA_CritEdSarvatathagatatattvasangraha


1987

STT:?_?_1987

ity uktvā,

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition DHARMA_CritEdSarvatathagatatattvasangraha


1988

STT:?_?_1988

svamaṇisamayajñānāny utpādayet //: vajraratnaṃ nabhe likhya vajraratnasamādhinā / ātmanas tu lalāṭe vai sthāpya rājā bhaved dhruvam // vajraratnaṃ samālikhya samayāgrīṃ tu bandhayet / sthāpyābhiṣekasthāneṣu rājyatvaṃ bhavate dhruvam // vajraratnaṃ samālikhya vajraratnasamādhinā / taj jñānaratnaṃ saṃsthāpya bhaved rājā svayaṃ kṛtaḥ // vajraratnaṃ nabhe likhya karmamudrāṃ tu bandhayet / svasthāne tat pratiṣṭhāpya bhaved rājā svayaṃ kṛtaḥ // iti tatraiṣāṃ hṛdayāni bhavanti //: mahāvajraratnābhiṣiñca māṃ // samayaratnābhiṣiñca mām // dharmaratnābhiṣiñca mām // karmaratnābhiṣiñca mām // vajraratnaṃ tu hṛdaye mahāmudrāṃ tu bhāvayet / bhāvayann abhiṣekaṃ tu prāpnoti paramādbhutam // vajraratnaṃ lalāṭe tu bhāvayan susamāhitaḥ / baddhvā vai ratnavajrīṃ tu bhaved rājā tu sarvataḥ // vajraratnaṃ tu jihvāyāṃ vajraratnasamādhinā / bhāvayann abhiṣekaṃ tu prāpnuyād dharmarājyatām // vajraratnaṃ svam uṣṇīṣe bhāvayan susamāhitaḥ / baddhvā vai karmamudrāṃ tu bhaved rājā sukarmakṛt // iti athāsāṃ hṛdayāni bhavanti //: oṃ vajraratnahṛdayābhiṣiñca hoḥ // oṃ vajraratnābhiṣeka traḥ // oṃ vajraratnajñānābhiṣeka vaṃ // oṃ vajraratnoṣṇīṣādhitiṣṭhasva mām // paṭādiṣu samālikhya vajraratnaṃ svam ātmanā / bhāvayaṃs tu mahāmudrāṃ mahārājā bhavet sa tu // paṭādiṣu samālikhya vajraratnam anuttaram / bhāvayet sattvavajrāṃ tu samayānāṃ bhavet patiḥ // paṭādiṣu samālikhya vajraratnaṃ svam ātmanā / bhāvayan dhyānamudrāṃ tu bhaved dharmādhipo dhruvam // paṭādiṣu samālikhya vajraratnam anuttaram / bhāvayet karmamudrāṃ tu bhavet karmādhipaḥ svam // iti tatraiṣāṃ hṛdayāni bhavanti //: vajraratnabimbādhitiṣṭha // vajraratnabimba pratiṣṭha // vajraratnabimbāviśa // vajraratnabimba kuru // sauvarṇaṃ vāpi raupyaṃ vā vajraratnaṃ tu bhāvayet / anyaratnamayaṃ vāpi hṛdi bhāvyābhiṣicyate // sauvarṇam anyaratnaṃ vā vajraratnaṃ tv anuttaram / sthāpya bhūyo lalāṭe tu bhaved rājā mahādhanaḥ // sauvarṇam anyaratnaṃ vā vajraratnaṃ tu bhāvayet / svamukhe caiva prakṣipya bhaved vācāṃ patis tu saḥ // sarvarṇam anyaratnaṃ vā vajraratnaṃ tu dhārayet / uṣṇīṣe bhāvayan bhūyaḥ sarvakarmapatir bhavet // iti tatraiṣāṃ hṛdayāni bhavanti //: oṃ vajraratnahṛdayābharaṇa hūṃ // oṃ vajraratnābhiṣekamahārthaprada // oṃ vajraratnavācaspate // oṃ vajraratnamahākarmapate // tato maṇikulasamayamudrārahasyajñānaṃ śikṣayet //: mahāvajramaṇiṃ baddhvā taṃ maṇiṃ strībhage tathā / praveśya tu mahāmudrāṃ bhāvayan siddhim āpnute // samayāgryāmaṇiṃ baddhvā strībhage samayāgryayā / baddhayā tu bhavet siddhir abhiṣekeṣu sarvaśaḥ // mahāvajramaṇiṃ baddhvā dharmamudrāṃ tu bhāvayan / taṃ maṇiṃ strībhage viddhvā bhavet siddhir anuttarā // karmamudrāmaṇiṃ viddhvā strībhage karmamudrayā / baddhayā tu bhavet siddhiḥ sarvakarmasv anuttarā // iti tatrāsāṃ hṛdayāni bhavanti //: oṃ mahāsiddhiḥ // oṃ samayābhiṣekasiddhiḥ // oṃ dharmasiddhiḥ // oṃ karmasiddhiḥ // athātra maṇḍale mahāmudrābandho bhavati //: ratnavajrāṅkurāṃ baddhva madhyānāmāntimāṅgulī / prasāritās tu saṃdhāya mūrdhni sthāpyāgrasiddhidhā // vajrabandhaṃ samādhāya granthitāgryā yugorṇagā / dvyaṅguṣṭhānāmikā vajrā parivartyābhi.ekadā // vajraratnaprayogeṇa sā eva parivartitā / tarjanyagramukhāsaṅgād abhiṣekaṃ dadāti sā // sā evāṅguṣṭhajyeṣṭhābhyāṃ dharma vajriprayogataḥ / baddhvā lalāṭagā caiva mahādharmābhiṣekadā // karmavajraṃ samādhāya lalāṭe paivartya vai / sarvābhiṣekamālāṃ tu sthāpayann abhiṣiñcati // ratnasaṃbhavamudrāṃ tu samayāṃ vajradhātujām / baddhvā ratnapratiṣṭhāṃ tu lalāṭe tv abhiṣicyate // aṅguṣṭhā baddhaparyaṅkā tarjanīdvayasaṃdhitā / maṇimukhāgryayoḥ kuryān mahāvajramaṇiṃ labhet // vajrabandhaṃ samādhāya maṇimuṣṭiṃ prasārayet / maṇis tu madhyamābhyāṃ tu maṇimālābhiṣekadā // vajrabandhaṃ samādhāya madhyamāmaṇiyojitā / dvyagrānāmavikāsā tu padmaṃ kṛtvā tu sidhyati // madhyamābhyāṃ maṇiṃ baddhvā sarvāṅgulayaḥ samutthitāḥ / bhāvayaṃs tu maṇīn eva bhavet suparivāravān // vajraratnaṃ samādhāya madhyamāṅguṣṭhayogataḥ / samānāmakaṇiṣṭhā tu jihvāmukha maṇipradā // sa eva tarjanī vajrasaṃsthā eva tthāṅkuśī / tarjanyā tarjanī karṣā tābhyāṃ tuṣṭipradāyikā // madhyamābhyāṃ maṇiṃ baddhvā dvyagrasaṃkocasaṃsthitā / buaddhvānāmāṅgulimukhāv aṅguṣṭhadvayacchāditā // sā eva sūryā vartā tu mūrdhni bāhuprasāritā / maṇidhvajāgrakeyūrā hāsayogena yogitā // vajrabandhaṃ samādhāya jyeṣṭhānāmamukhotthitā / tābhiḥ padmaṃ tu saṃbhāvya madhyamābhyāṃ maṇīkṛtā // sā evāntyapradānā tu vajrakośaprayogitā / vajracakraprayogā tu sā eva mukhatoddhṛtā // vajraratnāṅkurāṃ baddhvā sarvāṅgulyaḥ prasārayet / tāṃ tu mūrdhni pratiṣṭhāpya ratnavṛṣṭiṃ tu varṣayet // sā eva cakrayogā tu hṛdi ratnadvidhīkṛtā / maṇigrahāgradaṃṣṭrā tu muṣṭir madhyamasaṃdhitā // iti tataḥ samayamudrājñānaṃ śikṣayet //: etā eva mahāmudrāḥ saṃpuṭīkṛtya bandhayet / guhyaguhyāḥ samāsena siddhiṃ dadyuś caturguṇam // iti yathā yad vajraguhye tu sarvakālaṃ na bandhayet / ataḥ paraṃ pravakṣyāmi dharmamudrāḥ samāsataḥ // iti traiḥ / graiḥ / haiḥ / saiḥ / gryaḥ / khaḥ / dvyaiḥ / haiḥ / dhraiḥ / dhryaiḥ / kraiḥ / vaiḥ / kyaḥ / raiḥ / vyaḥ / maiḥ //

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition DHARMA_CritEdSarvatathagatatattvasangraha

2042

STT:?_?_2042

oṃ sarvābhiṣekajñāna hūṃ //

2043

STT:?_?_2043

athākāśagarbho bodhisattvo mahāsattva idaṃ svakulajñānamaṇḍalam abhāṣat //: athātaḥ saṃpravakṣyāmi jñānamaṇḍalam uttamam / vajradhātupratīkāśaṃ ratnajñānam iti smṛtam // mahāmaṇḍalayogena sūtrayet sarvamaṇḍalam / hṛdi cihnās tu saṃlekhyā dharmamanḍalayogataḥ // iti athātra maṇḍale jñānahṛdayāni bhavanti //: oṃ sarvārthasiddhijñāna hūṃ // oṃ maṇijñāna hūṃ // oṃ maṇijñānaṅkuśa // oṃ maṇijñānarāga // oṃ maṇijñānatuṣṭi // oṃ maṇijñānadṛṣṭi hūṃ // oṃ maṇijñānābhiṣeka // oṃ maṇijñānasūrya // oṃ maṇijñānadhvaja // oṃ maṇijñānāṭṭahāsa // oṃ maṇijñānapadma hūṃ // oṃ jñānamaṇityāga // oṃ jñānamaṇikośa // oṃ jñānamaṇicakra // oṃ jñānamaṇibhāṣa // oṃ jñānamaṇiratnavarṣa // oṃ maṇijñānanṛtyapūjāsamaya // oṃ maṇijñānarakṣa // oṃ maṇijñānayakṣa // oṃ maṇijñānamuṣṭi // athātra maṇḍale yathāvad vidhivistaraṃ kṛtvā, śiṣyān evaṃ brūyāt /: na tvayādṛṣṭadharmamaṇḍalasya vaktavyam / mā te maraṇakālaḥ śīghram evāsiddhasya syāt /

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition DHARMA_CritEdSarvatathagatatattvasangraha


2050

STT:?_?_2050

ity uktvā maṇikuladharmajñānāny utpādayet //: vajragarbhaṃ samālikhya paṭādiṣu samādhinā / bhāvayan yācayed arthān dehi ratna iti bruvan // vajragarbhaṃ samālikhya paṭādiṣu samādhinā / bhāvayan yācayed ratnān dehi dehīti vāg bruvan // vajragarbhaṃ samālikhya paṭādiṣu vibhāvayan / samāpattyā tu saddharmaṃ dehi jñāneti yācayet // vajragarbhaṃ samālikhya paṭādiṣu vibhāvayan / samāpattyā tu satkarma karme dehīti yācayet // iti tatraiṣāṃ hṛdayāni bhavanti //: oṃ dehi sarvārthān bhagavan vajragarbha // oṃ dehi sarvaratnān bhagavan vajragarbha // oṃ dehi saddharmaṃ bhagvan vajragarbha satsattva // oṃ dehi bhagavan satkarma bhagavan vajragarbha // ākāśe vānyadeśe vā bhāvyan susamāhitaḥ / ākāśagarbhaṃ satsatvaṃ yācayed arthasaṃpadaḥ // ākāśe vānyadeśe vā bhāvayan susamāhitaḥ / ākāśagarbhaṃ satsattvaṃ yācayed ratnasaṃcayam // ākāśe vānyadeśe vā bhavayan susamāhitaḥ / ākāśagarbhaṃ satsattvaṃ yācayed dharmasaṃpadaḥ // ākāśe vānyadeśe vā bhāvayan susamāhitaḥ / ākāśagarbhaṃ satsattvaṃ yācayet karmasaṃcayam // iti atraiṣāṃ hṛdayāni bhavanti //: oṃ jñānagarbha dehi sarvārthān // oṃ jñānagarbha dehi sarvaratnān // oṃ jñānagarbha dehi sarvadharmān // oṃ jñānagarbha dehi sarmakarmān // vajragarbhaṃ hṛdi likhya bhāvayan susamāhitaḥ / yadā tu hṛdayaṃ kampet tataḥ siddho dhanaṃ dadet // vajragarbhaṃ lalāṭe tu samālikhya vibhāvayan / yadā tu karmapate śīrṣam abhiṣekaṃ sa lapsyati // vajragarbhaṃ mukhe viddhvā lābhayet tatra eva hi / yadā tu sphuṭate tat tu tadā vāg asya sidhyati // vajragarbhaṃ svamūrdhne tu pratiṣṭhāpya bhāvayet / yadā tu jvalate tat tu tadaivordhvaṃgamo bhavet // iti tatiraṣāṃ hṛdayāni bhavanti //: oṃ hṛdayagarbha dehi dhanam // oṃ ratnābhiṣekagarbhābhiṣiñca // oṃ vāggarbha sidhya // oṃ ratnagarbhoṣṇīṣākāśaṃ gaccha // vajragarbhamahāmudrāṃ bhāvayan susamāhitaḥ / yācayed dehi siddhiṃ me ili ratneti sidhyati // ākāśagarbhasamayīṃ baddhvā tu samāhitaḥ / yācayed abhiṣekāṇi mili ratneti lapsyati // vajragarbhasamādhiṃ tu bhāvayan susamāhitaḥ / yācayed dehi me dharmaṃ cili ratneti lapsyati // ākāśagarbhakarmagrīṃ baddhvā tu susamāhitaḥ / yācayet sarvaratnāni kili ratneti sidhyati // atraiṣāṃ hṛdayāni bhavanti //: oṃ ili // oṃ mili // oṃ cili // oṃ kili // tato maṇijñānarahasyamudrājñānāni bhavanti //: dvayendriyasamāpattyā vajragarbhaṃ tu bhāvayet / ākāśe vānyadeśe vā parāṃ siddhim avāpnute // dvayendriyasamāpattyā vajragarbhaṃ tu bhāvayet / ālekhyaṃ citralikhitaṃ prāpnuyād abhiṣecanam // dvayendriyasamāpattyā vajragarbhaṃ tu bhāvayan / taṃ priyaṃ yasya ramayet sarvalokaṃ sa rāgayet // dvayendriyasamāpattyā vajragarbhaṃ tu bhāvayan / sarvākāśarajobimbaiḥ sarvasiddhir bhaved dhruvam // iti tatrāsāṃ hṛdayāni bhavanti //: ākāśaguhyajñāna sādhaya hūṃ // cittaguhyajñānābhiṣiñca hūṃ // priyānusmṛtijñānaguhya sarvalokaṃ rāmaya hūṃ // sarvaguhyajñāna sarvasiddhiṃ me prayaccha hūṃ // tato mahāmudrāṃ yathāvad badhnīyāt / tādṛśaiva siddhiḥ // tato dharmasamayamudrājñānaṃ śikṣayet //: vajramaṇiṃ vajrajñānamaṇḍalayogena sthāpayet // atha dharmamudrā bhavanti //: saḥ / rāḥ / gaḥ / sāḥ / raḥ / teḥ / keḥ / hāḥ / dhaṃ / tīḥ / he / bhā / ka / raṃ / yaḥ / saḥ /

Translation

2089

STT:?_?_2089

mahāsattvaprayogeṇa ratnasattvaḥ samālikhet // iti tatrāsāṃ mudrā bhavanti //: oṃ maṇiratnapūjāgrya // oṃ sarvārthasiddhivajraratnābhiṣeke hūṃ // oṃ vajramaṇidhāriṇisamaye hūṃ // oṃ maṇiratnākarṣakarmasamaye hūṃ // oṃ maṇiratnarāgaratikarmapūje pravarta // oṃ maṇiratnasādhukārapūjāsamaye // oṃ mahāmaṇiratnadṛṣṭyākarṣe // oṃ maṇiratnamālāpūje // oṃ maṇiratnasūryālokapūje // oṃ maṇiratnadhvajapatākāpūje // oṃ maṇiratnāṭṭahāsapūje // oṃ padmamaṇisamādhisamaye hūṃ // oṃ sarvatyāgānusmṛtisamādhikarmakāri hūṃ // oṃ maṇiratnatīkṣṇasamaye chinda cchinda hūṃ // oṃ maṇiratnacakrasamaye hūṃ // oṃ maṇiratnabhāṣe vada vada hūṃ // oṃ maṇiratnavṛṣṭikarmasamaye hūṃ // oṃ maṇiratnakarmaṇi hūṃ // oṃ maṇiratnakavace rakṣa hūṃ // oṃ maṇiratnadaṃṣṭri khāda khāda hūṃ // oṃ maṇiratnakarmamuṣṭi hūṃ // oṃ maṇiratnalāsye pūjaya hoḥ // oṃ maṇiratnamālābhiṣeke pūjaya // oṃ maṇiratnagīte pūjaya // oṃ maṇiratnanṛtye pūjaya // oṃ maṇiratnadhūpe pūjaya // oṃ maṇiratnapuṣpe pūjaya // oṃ maṇiratnadīpe pūjaya // oṃ maṇiratnagandhe pūjaya // oṃ maṇiratnāṅkuśyākarṣe jjaḥ // oṃ maṇiratnapāśe hūṃ // oṃ maṇiratnasphoṭe vaṃ // oṃ maṇiratnāveśe aḥ // athātra karmamaṇḍale yathāvad vidhivistaraṃ kṛtvā, praveśyaivaṃ vadet / na tvayā kasyacid ayaṃ vaktavyaḥ / mā te karmāvaraṇādhiṣṭhitasyaiva maraṇaṃ bhavet

2098

STT:?_?_2098

ity uktvā, maṇikarmajñānāni śikṣayet // vajragarbhamahāmudrāṃ baddhvā tu susamāhitaḥ / pūjayan sarvapūjābhiḥ sarvabuddhān vaśaṃ nayet // baddhvā caikatarāṃ mudrāṃ samayāgrīṃ samādhinā / pūjayan sarvabuddhāṃs tu svabhiṣekān sa lapsyati // vajragarbhasamādhiṃ tu bhāvayan susamāhitaḥ / pūjayan sarvabuddhāṃs tu nāśayej jagad uttamam // baddhvā karmamayīṃ mudrāṃ vajragarbhasamādhinā / pūjayan sarvabuddhāṃs tu sarvārthāṃl labhate kṣaṇāt // iti tatraiṣāṃ hṛdayāni bhavanti //: oṃ ratnapūja vaśīkuru // oṃ ratnapūjāsamayābhiṣiñca // oṃ ratnapūjādharma nāśaya patim // oṃ ratnapūjākarma sarvārthān me dada // atha rahasyamudrākarmajñānaṃ bhavati //: dvayendriyasamāpattyā vajragarbhasamādhinā / pūjayan sarvabuddhāṃs tu sarvalokaṃ sa rāgayet // iti

2119

STT:?_?_2119

oṃ vajraratna sarvābhiṣekasarvasiddhayo me prayaccha rala rala hūṃ traḥ // tato rahasyamudrāṃ darśayet //: paṭiṃ vāpi priyāṃ vā pi striyaṃ vā puruṣo ’pi vā / lalāṭadvayasaṃdhānād buddhaṃ dvāv api sidhyataḥ // tatrāsyāḥ sādhanahṛdayaṃ bhavati //: oṃ vajraratna sakhividyādharatvaṃ prayaccha śīghram abhiṣiñcāhi ha ha ha ha trāḥ // tato yathāvac caturmudrābandhaṃ caturvidhiṃ śikṣayet / tathaiva sidhya iti // catumudrāmaṇḍalam // athākāśagarbho bodhisattvo mahāsattva idaṃ sarvārthasiddhiṃ nāma hṛdayam abhāṣat //: oṃ vajramaṇidhara sarvārthasiddhiṃ me prayaccha ho bhagavan vajraratna hūṃ // athātra maṇḍalaṃ bhavati //: athātaḥ saṃpravakṣyāmi mahāmaṇḍalam uttamam / yathāvat tu samālekhyaṃ sarvasiddhes tu maṇḍalam // iti athātra jñānarahasyamudrājñānaṃ śikṣayet //: rūpādīnāṃ tu kāmānām aviraktaḥ sukhāni tu / niryātayaṃs tu buddhebhyaḥ kalpasiddhim avāpunte // iti tataś caturvidhaṃ mudrājñānaṃ śikṣayet // evaṃ paṭādiṣu sattvaṃ mudrāṃ vā maṇḍaleṣu likhya sādhayed iti //

2150

STT:?_?_2150

((tatra prathamaṃ tāvan mahāmudrottamasiddhitantraṃ bhavati)): buddhājñāt sarvasattvārthāt sarvasiddhiprayogataḥ / sādhayaṃs tu mahāmudrāṃ buddhatvam iha janmani // iti atha samayamudrottamasiddhitantraṃ bhavati //: yathā vajradharaḥ siddhas tathāham iti bhāvayan / mahāmudrāprayogeṇa kṣaṇāt sauritvam āpnute // iti atha dharmamudrottamasiddhitantraṃ bhavati //: anakṣareṣu dharmeṣu prapañco na hi vidyate / idaṃ vadaṃs tu dharmāgrīṃ bhāvayan sauritāṃ vrajet // iti atha karmamudrottamasiddhitantraṃ bhavati //: yat karoti hi karmaṃ vai śubhaṃ vā yadi vāśubham / niryātayañ jinebhyas tu kṣaṇāt sauritāṃ vrajet // iti

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition DHARMA_CritEdSarvatathagatatattvasangraha


2155

STT:?_?_2155

atha vajrapāṇir mahābodhisattvaḥ padmakulottamasiddhitantram udājahāra //: tatra prathamaṃ tāvan mahāmudrottamasiddhitantraṃ bhavati //: rāgaḥ śuddhaḥ svabhāvena tīrthikair avamanyate / tasyāvirāgo dharmo ’smin mahāyāne tu sidhyati // iti atha samayamudrottamasiddhitantraṃ bhavati //: abhyasaṃs tu mahāmaitrīṃ samādhidṛḍhayogataḥ / sphārayed vidhivad yogāt kṣaṇāt sauritvam āpnuyāt // iti atha dharmamudrotamasiddhitantraṃ bhavati //: svabhāvaśuddhaḥ saṃrāga iti brūyād imaṃ nayam / rāgapāramitāprāptaḥ kṣaṇāt sauritvam āpnuyāt // iti atha karmamudrottamasiddhitantraṃ bhavati //: darśanasparśanābhyāṃ tu śravaṇasmaraṇena vā / syām ahaṃ sarvasattvānāṃ sarvaduḥkhāntakasiddhiḥ // iti

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition DHARMA_CritEdSarvatathagatatattvasangraha


2160

STT:?_?_2160

atha vajrapāṇir mahābodhisattvo maṇikulottamasiddhitantram udājahāra //: tatra mahāmudrottamasiddhitantraṃ bhavati //: sarvabuddhābhiṣeko ’haṃ bhaveyaṃ vajrgarbhavat / iti bhāvanāṃ bhāvayan vai kṣaṇāt sauritvam āpnute // iti atha samayamudrottamasiddhitantraṃ bhavati //: bhaveyaṃ sarvasattvānāṃ sarvāśāparipūrakaḥ / ākāśagarbhasadṛśaḥ kṣaṇāt sauritvam āpnute // iti atha dharmamudrottamasiddhitantraṃ bhavati //: ātmanas tu samutsṛjya dhanadān suharṣitaḥ / vadan dharmamayīṃ mudrām iha sauritvam āpnute // iti atha karmamudrottamasiddhitantraṃ bhavati //: daridrāṇāṃ hitārthāya dhanotpādanatatparaḥ / udyogāt sauritāṃ yāti na cet siddhir yathopari // iti

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition DHARMA_CritEdSarvatathagatatattvasangraha

2166

STT:?_?_2166

atha vajrapāṇir mahābodhisattvaḥ punar api sarvatathāgatasamayasiddhitantram udājahāra //: tatredaṃ tathāgatasamayasiddhitantraṃ bhavati // yasya rāgasamāpattis tasya rāgeṇa śodhayet / iti buddhamahāmudrājñānasya samayaḥ smṛtaḥ // tatredaṃ tathāgatasamayasiddhitantraṃ bhavati //: kāmānām avirāgas tu samayaḥ sumahānayam / tathāgatakule śuddho nātikramyo jinair api // atha vajrakulasamayasiddhitantraṃ bhavati //: akrodhasyāpi sattvārthān mahākrodhapradarśanam / mahāvajrakule tv eṣa samayo duratikramaḥ // tatredaṃ padmakulasamayasiddhitantraṃ bhavati //: svabhāvaśuddhajñānena kuryād yathābhirucitaḥ / mahāpadmakule tv eṣa samayo duratikramaḥ // tatredaṃ maṇikulasamayasiddhitantraṃ bhavati //: alpatve vā bahutve vā yathābhirucitaṃ punaḥ / avandhyo divaśaḥ kāryo dānena samayo hy ayam // iti

2173

STT:?_?_2173

atha vajrapāṇir mahābodhisattvaḥ sarvatathāgatadharmamudrājñānasiddhitantram udājahāra //: tatredaṃ tathāgatadharmasiddhitantraṃ bhavati //: buddho dharma iti khyāta ity uktvā dharmatākṣaram / buddhadharmamahāmudrājñānasya paramaṃ nayam // tatredaṃ tathāgatakuladharmasiddhitantram // rāgāc chuddhataro nāsti dharmaḥ sarvasukhapradaḥ / tathāgatakule ’py eṣa dharmaḥ siddhikaraḥ paraḥ // tatredaṃ vajrakuladharmasiddhitantram //: buddhājñāc chodanārthād vā sattvatrāṇārthatas tathā / akruddho ’pi hi saṃduṣṭān mārayañ chuddhim āpnute // tatredaṃ padmakuladharmasiddhitantram // aliptaṃ salilaiḥ padmaṃ tathā rāgo na duṣyati / iti bruvann akāryāṇi kurvan pāpair na lipyate // tatredaṃ maṇikuladharmasiddhitantram // dānāt samo na dharmo ’sti pratipattyā bravīti hi / mahāmaṇikuladharmaḥ, na cet siddhir yathopari // iti

2180

STT:?_?_2180

atha vajrapāṇir mahābodhisattvaḥ sarvatathāgatakarmasiddhitantram udājahāra //: tatredaṃ tathāgatakarmasiddhitantraṃ bhavati //: buddhatvaṃ sarvasattvānāṃ bodhisattvatvam eva ca / yathāvad vinayaṃś caiva karmamudrāgrasiddhidā // tatredaṃ tathāgatakulakarmasiddhitantraṃ bhavati //: caturvidhābhiḥ pūjābhiḥ sadāyogāc caturvidham / catuḥkālaprayogeṇa kurvan karmāṇi sādhayet // tatredaṃ vajrakulakarmasiddhitantram // duṣṭasattvopaghātāya yad yat kāryaṃ karoti saḥ / karmavajrakule ’py eṣa sarvasiddhipradāyakaḥ // tatredaṃ padmakulakarmasiddhitantram //: bhayātmanām abhayado yathāvad vinayaṃs tathā / etat padmakulakarmabuddhasiddhipradāyakam // atha maṇikulakarmasiddhitantram // abhiṣekas tathā dānaṃ sarvāśāparipūrayaḥ / buddhānāṃ dehināṃ caiva karma sarvārthasādhakam // iti

2187

STT:?_?_2187

atha vajrapāṇir mahābodhisattvaḥ sarvatathāgatadharmatāmudrājñānasiddhitantram udājahāra //: tatredaṃ tathāgatadharmatājñānasiddhitantraṃ bhavati //: vajrasattvasamādhis tu buddhānāṃ dharmatā smṛtā / etad buddhasya buddhatvaṃ na buddho bhavate ’nyataḥ // tatredaṃ tathāgatakuladharmatājñānasiddhitantram // bhāvayaṃs tu mahāmudrāṃ sādhayet sarvasiddhayaḥ / tathāgatakule ’py eṣa dharmatottamasiddhidā // tatredaṃ vajrakuladharmatājñānasiddhitantram //: baddhābhiḥ samayāgryābhiḥ sarvakarmāṇi sādhayet / mahāmudrāprayogeṇa vajrasiddhim avāpnuyāt // tatredaṃ padmakuladharmatājñānasiddhitantram //: dharmamudrāprayogeṇa dharmamudrā pravartayet / anayā sādhayan dharmān dharmatā vajradharminaḥ // tatredaṃ maṇikuladharmatājñānasiddhitantram //: karmamudrāprayogeṇa karmavajraṃ hṛdi sthitam / bhāvayan dharmatām etām avāpnoti svakarmatām // iti

2194

STT:?_?_2194

atha vajrapāṇir mahābodhisattvaḥ sarvatthāgatajñānasiddhitantram udājahāra //: tatredaṃ tathāgatajñānasiddhitantraṃ bhavati //: vajrasattvasamādhisthaś candravajraprayogataḥ / yathāvarṇe tu tau vetti tathā lokaṃ tu vetti saḥ // śuddhe śuddham iti jñeyaṃ pāṇḍare tu prabhāsvaram / rakte raktaṃ taraṃ kruddhaṃ yādṛgvarṇatadātmakam // tatredaṃ tathāgatakulajñānasiddhitantram // mahāmudrāṃ samādhāya candramaṇḍalasaprabhām / svayaṃ kāyaṃ yathā vetti tathā vedyaṃ jaganmanaḥ // tatredaṃ vajrakulajñānasiddhitantram //: ākāśe vānyadeśe vā kruddhaḥ san maṇḍalāni tu / yādṛśāni tu paśyed vai vijñeyaṃ tādṛśaṃ mahaḥ // tatredaṃ padmakulajñānasiddhitantram // sūkṣmam akṣarapaṅkutir vā paśyann ākāśabhūmiṣu / yādṛgvarṇaṃ samāsena vetti cittaṃ sa tādṛśam // tatredaṃ maṇikulajñānasiddhitantram //: sarvalokaṃ nirīkṣan vai pratibhāso hi yādṛśaḥ / paśyate tādṛśaṃ caiva jagaccittaṃ tu lakṣayet // iti etā eva samāpattyo gamanāgamanāni tu / kurvantyaś ca bhramantyo vā yathā paśyet tathā gamaḥ // yasya yasya ca sattvasya samāpattya tu cintayet / tasya tasya tathā caiva sarvacittāni budhyati //

2205

STT:?_?_2205

atha vajrapāṇir mahābodhisattvaḥ sarvatathāgatasiddhijñānatantram udājahāra //: tatredaṃ tathāgatasiddhijñānatantram //: sattvādhiṣṭhānayogena buddhabimbātmabhāvanā / anena jñānayogena buddhasiddhim avāpnuyāt // tatredaṃ tathāgatakulasiddhijñānatantram //: ākāśe vānyadeśe vā śvetapītābhamaṇḍalān / svamudrāsattvam ātmānaṃ sākṣād iva sa paśyati // tatredaṃ vajrakulasiddhijñānatantram //: tādṛśeṣv eva bimbeṣu madhye śyāmaṃ niyacchati / siddhir vajrakulasyāgrā bhavec chīghraṃ yad icchati // tatredaṃ padmakulasiddhijñānatantram //: tāny evākāśanīlāni padmākārāṇi paśyati / mahāpadmakule vidyāsiddhayaḥ saṃ bhavanti hi // tatredaṃ maṇikulasiddhijñānatantram //: ākāśe vānyadeśe vā ta evākāśanirmalāḥ / sphuranto raśmimaṇḍāni paśyan siddhiṃ laghv āpnuyāt // iti vajrasattvādayaḥ sattvāś candramaṇḍalasaprabhāḥ / prāg darśayanti cātmānaṃ siddhikāle svarūptataḥ // //

2257

STT:?_?_2257

atha bhagavān vajrapāṇir mahābodhisattvaḥ sarvatathāgatasiddhimudrātantram udājahāra //: tatredaṃ tathāgatasiddhitantraṃ bhavati //: buddhamudrāṃ tu saṃdhāya tathāgatam anusmaran / sādhayan sidhyate śīghraṃ buddhabodhir api sthirā // tatredaṃ tathāgatakulasiddhitantram //: vajrasattvamahāmudrāṃ baddhvā tu paribhāvayan / purato vajrasattvaṃ ca siddhiḥ śīghratarā bhavet // tatredaṃ vajrakulasiddhitatnram //: baddhvā tu samayāgrīṃ vai vajrasattvasamādhinā / bhāvayan vajrasattvaṃ ca siddhis tu dviguṇā bhavet // tatredaṃ padmakulasiddhitantram //: baddhvā dharmamayīṃ mudrāṃ lokeśvarasamādhinā / bhāvayaṃl lokanāthaṃ ca siddhis tu dviguṇā bhavet // tatredaṃ maṇikulasiddhitantram //: karmamudrāṃ samādhāya vajragarbhasamādhinā / bhāvayan vajragarbhaṃ ca siddhis tu dviguṇā bhavet //

2266

STT:?_?_2266

ity āha bhagavān buddhaḥ // tatredaṃ tathagatakulasarvasiddhisādhanatantram //: sādhayet sarvamudrās tu kāmo ’ham iti bhāvayan / vajrajāpaprayogeṇa sarvasiddhyagrasādhanam //

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition DHARMA_CritEdSarvatathagatatattvasangraha

2377

STT:?_?_2377

((ity āha bhagavān vajradharaḥ //)) ((ity āha bhagavān vajrahūṃkāraḥ //)) tatredaṃ padmakulamāraṇasiddhitantram //: akāruṇyād amaitryās tu duḥsattvānām aśodhanāt / ātmanaś ca visaṃvādān mārayan siddhim āpnuyāt //

Translation

2491

ity āha bhagavān sarvatathāgatasamayaḥ // tatredaṃ tathāgatakulasamayaguhyasiddhitantram //: sarvasattvamanovyāpi sarvasattvasukhapradaḥ / sarvasattvapitā caiva kāmo ’graḥ samayāgriṇām //

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition DHARMA_CritEdSarvatathagatatattvasangraha


2493

STT:?_?_2493

ity āhur bhagavantaḥ sarvatathāgatāḥ // idaṃ tat sarvabuddhānāṃ rahasyaṃ paramādbhutam / vijñāya śraddadhac chrāddho duḥsādhyo ’pi hi sidhyati // tatredaṃ vajrakulasamayaguhyasiddhitantram // rāgaśuddhyai viraktānāṃ tīrthyadṛṣṭikṛtātmanām / māraṇaṃ samayaṃ tv agram idaṃ vijñāya sidhyati //

2529

2609

STT:?_?_2609

ity āha bhagavān vajraḥ // tatredaṃ vajrakulasamādhikarmasiddhitantram //: pāpaśuddhinimittaṃ hi sarvapāpapradāmakam / māraṇaṃ sarvasattvānāṃ śraddadhānāṃ tu sidhyati //

Translation

2713

STT:?_?_2713

tatrāyaṃ tathāgatakulopacāravidhivistaraḥ //: tatrāyaṃ hṛdayopacāravidhivistaro bhavati //: mahāmaṇḍalaṃ dṛṣṭvā dhūpapuṣpadīpagandhapūjāṃ mudrābhiḥ kṛtvā tato vajravācā jāpam ārabhet // tatrāyaṃ jāpavidhir bhavati //: yathāsthānasthitaś caturmāsaṃ catuḥsaṃdhyaṃ dhūpādibhir yathāvat pūjāṃ kṛtvā, sarvatathāgatamahāyānābhisamayanāmāṣṭaśatena sarvatathāgatān adhiṣṭutya, caturmudrāpraṇāmayogena praṇamann ātmaniryātanapūjā kāryānena mantracatuṣṭayena // oṃ sarvatathāgatapūjopasthānāyātmānaṃ niryātayāmi, sarvatathāgatavajrasattvādhiṣṭhasva mām // oṃ sarvatathāgatapūjābhiṣekāyātmānaṃ niryātayāmi, sarvatathāgatavajraratnābhiṣiñca mām // oṃ sarvatathāgatapūjāpravartanāyātmānaṃ niryātayāmi, sarvatathāgatavajradharma pravartaya mām // oṃ sarvatahāgatapūjākarmaṇa ātmānaṃ niryātayāmi, sarvatathāgatavajrakarma kuru māṃ //

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition DHARMA_CritEdSarvatathagatatattvasangraha


2720

STT:?_?_2720

tato ’viraktaḥ sarvakāmaguṇeṣu sarvāhāraḥ sarvakāmopabhogī hṛdayārthataḥ svam ātmānaṃ buddhabimbaṃ purato vāṅmātreṇāpi bhāvayan yathākāmakaraṇīyatayāṣṭaśataṃ vajravācā jāpann āśu prasidhyati.

2723

STT:?_?_2723

tasya caturmāhāsattvamaṇḍalayogena yathābhirucitavarṇābharaṇā mahāsattvāś candramaṇḍalapratiṣṭhitā lekhyāḥ koṇabhāgeṣu kuladevya iti //

Translation

2724

STT:?_?_2724

tataḥ paṭasyodārāṃ pūjāṃ kṛtvā, yathāvaj japayogena tāvaj japed yāvan māsacatuṣṭayam / tataḥ sakalāṃ rātriṃ japet / tataḥ prabhāte sarvatathāgatatattvādim uttamasiddhim avāpnoti /

2726

STT:?_?_2726

2828

STT:?_?_2828

yāṃ mudrāṃ sādhayed vajrasddhir ity uktvā rddhisiddhiś caturvidhā bhavati / tad yathā jalasyopari caṅkramaṇaniṣīdanādikam / tathāgatādisarvarūpasaṃdarśanam / yāvad abhirucis tāvad adṛśyatvam / ākāśagāmī ca yojanasahasramūrdhnam utpataty adhastāc ca gacchaty āgacchati // sarvadiśaś ca yojanasahasrād yathābhirucitavegaḥ paribhramyāgacchati / yojanasahasrād adhvena sarvasattvamanīṣitāni jānāti // sarvabhāvāni ca cakṣuṣā paśyati / śrotreṇa śṛṇoti / sarvadikṣu ca yojanasahasrād adhvena manobhirucitāḥ sarvastriyo ’ṅge samutkṣipyānayati // sarvahiraṇyasuvarṇamaṇimuktādayaś ca sarvārthān apaharati // na cāsya kaścit kiṃ cic chaknoti kartum / yad vajreṇāpy adhṛṣyo bhavati, kiṃ punar apy anyaiḥ //

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition DHARMA_CritEdSarvatathagatatattvasangraha

No translation available yet for this part of the edition DHARMA_CritEdSarvatathagatatattvasangraha

2980

STT:?_?_2980

atha vajrapāṇir mahābodhisattva utthāyāsanād anena nāmāṣṭaśatena bhagavantam adhīyeṣa // vajradhātu mahāsattvas sattvārtha paramātmaka / śākyarāja mahājñāna vajrātmaka namo ’stu te // sattvodbhava paramārtha or sattvasaṃbhava tattvārtha sattvaheto mahānaya / mahāsattvārtha kāryārtha sattvasattva namo ’stu te // buddhadharma mahādharma dharmacakrapravartaka / mahāvāca suvidyāgra mahāsattva namo ’stu te // mahākarma mahārakṣa sarvakarmaprasādhaka / mahātma sattvacaryāgra sattvaheto namo ’stu te // sarvapāramitāprāpta sarvajñajñāna buddhivan / sarvasattva mahopāya mahāprajña namo ’stu te // mahākāruṇikāgryāgrya kāruṇyakaruṇātmaka / sarvadāto mahāmaitrya sarvacarya namo ’stu te // śākyasiṃha mahāśākya śākyaśākya mahāmune / vibho mahāvinaya neyārtha vinayāgra namo ’stu te // dharmadhātusamatvāpta dharmadhāto tathāgata / vajranātha mahānātha sattvarāśe namo ’stu te // mahāprabha mahāloka mahāvīrya mahābala / mahāvīra pravīrāgrya śaṃbho śaure namo ’stu te // bṛhan svayaṃbhūr bhagavan śākyavīra mahāmune / sarvātmaka mune śuddha dharmarāja namo ’stu te // akāya kāya kāyāgrya trikāyākāyasādhaka / sarvakāya mahākāya vajrakāya namo ’stu te // avāca vāca vācāgrya trivācāvācadarśaka / sarvavāca mahāvāca vajravāca namo ’stu te // acitta citta cittāgrya tricittācittadarśakaḥ / sarvacitta mahācitta vajracitta namo ’stu te // avajra vajra vajrāgrya trivajrāvajraśodhaka / sarvavajra mahāvajra vajravajra nomo ’stu te // sarvavyāpi bhavāgryāgrya sugatādhipate jina / traidhātukamahārāja vairocana namo ’stu te // nāmāṣṭaśatakaṃ caitad yaḥ kaścic chṛṇuyāt sakṛt / paṭhed vā bhāvayed vāpi sarvabuddhatvam āpnuyāt // adhyeṣayāmi tvāṃ nātha sarvasattvahitārthataḥ / mahākaruṇyam utpādya dharmacakraṃ pravartaya // iti atha bhagavān vairocanaḥ sarvatathāgatādhipateḥ pratijñāvacanam upaśrutya sarvatathāgatān āhūyaivam āha // pratipadyata, bhagavantas tathāgatāḥ, samājaṃ punar āgantum

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition DHARMA_CritEdSarvatathagatatattvasangraha

3029

STT:?_?_3029

pratipadyata mārṣās tathāgato ’rhan samyaksaṃ buddho lokānuvartanaṃ kṛtvā punar anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhiṃ darśayiṣyati // mā marṣā evaṃ vidyur `na tathāgato mānuṣo bhavati’ / evā eva tathāgatāḥ bhaviṣyanti, devasaṃpattaye ghaṭayeyuḥ / na tathāgatatva iti / tat sādhu pratipadyata tatra pūjanāya gantum /

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition DHARMA_CritEdSarvatathagatatattvasangraha


3030

STT:?_?_3030

iti atha maheśvarādisarvadevādhipatayo yena bodhimaṇḍo yena ca bhagavān bodhimaṇḍaniṣaṇṇas tenopajagmuḥ / upetya ca bhagavātaḥ pādau śirasābhivandya bhagavantam evam ūcuḥ / pratipadyasva, bhagavann asmākam anukampām upādāyāsmāt tṛṣṇasaṃstarād utthāya divyeṣv āsaneṣu niṣadyānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃboddhum

3043

STT:?_?_3043

atha bhagavān rātrau prabhātāyāṃ lokānuvartanatayā mārāṃ jitvānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhyaśeṣānavaśeṣasarvasattvadhātuhitopakāraṃ svahṛdayāvasthitam āryavajrapāṇim anena nāmāṣṭaśatenābhiṣṭauti // vajrasattva mahāsattva mahāyāna mahātmaka / mahāloka mahāśuddha mahānātha namo ’stu te // vajrarāja mahāvajra vajra sarvatathāgata / mahāsattva mahāvīrya mahopāya namo ’stute // vajrarāga mahāśuddha sarvasaukhya mahāsukha / sukhāgryānādinidhana mahākāma namo ’stu te // vajrasādhu mahātuṣṭi sādhukāra praharṣaka / mahāharṣa mahāmodya suprāmodya namo ’stu te // vajraratna mahārāja svabhiṣeka mahāpate / sarvaratna mahāśobha vibhūṣaṇa namo ’stu te // vajrateja mahāteja mahāprabha mahādyute / jinaprabha mahājvāla buddhaprabha namo ’stu te // vajraketu mahāketu mahādhvaja dhanaprada / ākāśaketo mahāyaṣṭi tyāgadhvaja namo ’stu te // vajrahāsa mahāhāsa mahāprīti pramodana / prītivega ratiprīte dharmaprīte namo ’stu te // vajradharma mahādharma sattvadharma suśodhaka / buddhadharma sudharmāgrya rāgadharma namo ’stu te // vajratīkṣṇa mahākośa prajñājñāna mahāmate / pāpaccheda mahāyudha buddhaśastra namo ’stu te // vajrahetu mahācakra buddhacakra mahānidhe / sarvamaṇḍala dharmāgrya dharmacakra namo ’stu te // vajrabhāṣa mahābhāṣa niṣprapañca mahākṣara / anakṣara mahājapa buddhavāca namo ’stu te // vajrakarma sukarmāgrya mahākarma sukarmakṛt / guhya[pūje mahāpūje buddhapūje namo ’stu te // vajrarakṣa mahāvarma kavacāgrya mahādṛḍha / mahārakṣa mahāsāra buddhavīrya namo ’stu te // vajrayakṣa mahākrodha sarvaduṣṭa bhayānaka / sarvabuddhamahopāya agrayakṣa namo ’stu te // vajrasaṃdhi mahāmudra mahāsamayabandhaka / mahāmuṣṭe sumudrāgrya vajramuṣṭe namo ’stu te // vandyo mānyaś ca pūjyaś ca satkartavyas tathāgataiḥ / yasmād anādinidhanaṃ bodhicittaṃ tvam ucyase // tvām āsādya jināḥ sarve buddhabodhisattvāś ca sauriṇaḥ / saṃbhūtāḥ saṃbhaviṣyanti buddhabodhyagrahetavaḥ // namas te vajrasattvāya vajraratnāya te namaḥ / namas te vajradharmāya namas te vajrakarmaṇe // tvām abhiṣṭutya nāmāryaiḥ praṇamya ca subhāvataḥ / yat puṇyaṃ tena sarvo hi buddhabodhim avāpnuyāt // yedaṃ uccārayet samyaṅ nāmāṣṭaśatam uttamam / sakṛd vāraṃ subhaktiś ca sarvabuddhatvam āpnuyāt //

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition DHARMA_CritEdSarvatathagatatattvasangraha

3066

STT:?_?_3066
